prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Lipstick 9.5 g, 02 Cherry Ade
title: Doesn't last very long but still exactly what I wanted!
review: I could never find the kind of gentle lip tint I was looking for. This is perfect. I like the "I just ate a red popsicle" look- like a gentle red tint that fades out to the edge of my lips. This needs to be re applied very often, like every 1.5 hrs minimum. But it's such an easy and gentle stain that's not a big deal. My favorite thing to use on my lips!!!

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Lipstick 9.5 g, 02 Cherry Ade
title: incredible
review: I wear this pretty much every day, it's the single best lip product I've ever used. Absolutely no residue, it feels like there's nothing on your lips. The colour is gorgeous and it builds the more you apply, and it smells good. It's fairly long lasting if you apply a lot, I usually have to reapply a couple times when I go out. Overall, this is an incredible product, highly recommend.

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Lipstick 9.5 g, 02 Cherry Ade
title: "Vibrant Beauty: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Cherry Ade Review"
review: The ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint in Cherry Ade (21AD) is a delightful addition to my makeup routine, offering a vivid burst of color with a lightweight and moisturizing formula. As a fan of K-beauty products, I was excited to try this lip tint, and it certainly did not disappoint.One of the standout features of this water tint is its vivid color payoff. The Cherry Ade shade adds a vibrant pop of red to my lips, instantly brightening up my complexion and adding a touch of playfulness to my look. The color is buildable, allowing me to achieve my desired intensity with ease.What sets this water tint apart is its moisturizing formula. Unlike some lip stains that can leave my lips feeling dry and parched, the Dear Darling Water Tint keeps my lips hydrated throughout the day. The weightless and non-sticky finish is comfortable to wear, making it perfect for everyday use.I also appreciate the smudge-proof and lightweight nature of this lip tint. Once applied, it stays put for hours without fading or feathering, allowing me to go about my day with confidence. Whether I'm sipping on coffee or enjoying a meal, I can trust that my lip color will remain intact.Another aspect that I love about this product is its versatility. In addition to being used as a lip tint, I've found that it can also double as a cheek stain, adding a natural flush of color to my complexion for a fresh and youthful look.In summary, the ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint in Cherry Ade (21AD) is a must-have for anyone looking for a vibrant and moisturizing lip stain. Its smudge-proof and lightweight formula, coupled with its vivid color payoff, make it a standout choice in the world of K-beauty. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast or simply love experimenting with different looks, this water tint is sure to become a staple in your collection.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 February 2024

Definitiv seinen Preis wert :)

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Lipstick 9.5 g, 02 Cherry Ade
title: Perfect for lasting tint
review: I freaking LOVE this product. Its very runny, almost like dyed water, but that makes it no less effective. You don't need to leave it on long for a subtle hint of colour. If you want to go darker, just reapply until you have the desired shade! It also lasts so long. I won't say it stays exactly how you applied it all day, it will gradually fade and may need a top up or two throughout the day. But personally even after a long day AND washing my face, there's still a lovely subtle hint of colour that makes me look more glowy and less pasty. It's also fantastic to use under red lipstick to maintain the colour.This could also double as a blush, however you have to be quick with the application. I've found a little drop on a sponge helps disperse the product, giving a gentle glow. But don't go OTT, or you'll get clown cheeks that are hard to clean up!To sum up, an all round fantastic product that's awesome for the price. Couldn't live without!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 November 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Lipstick 9.5 g, 02 Cherry Ade
title: Wow
review: Amo questi prodotti così confezionati ed ho deciso di provarlo..possiedo già i benefit così ma ho sempre trovato che nonostante i prezzi e la pubblicità se non sfumati subito sulle guance il segno resta netto..questo rispetto ai prodotti detti e un signor nessuno,che arriva e sembra un color sangue..ma sfumato è u  delizioso ciliegia che per chi come me ha la carnagione bianchissima è stupendo..soprattutto ho avuto il tempo di sposarlo e di sfumarlo tranquiamente senza problemi di segni..veramente un prodotto degno di nota

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Lipstick 9.5 g, 02 Cherry Ade
title: Bon dupe Benefit
review: Vu certains commentaires je m’attendais à pire !Fais son job très bien sur les joues, un peu moins sur les lèvres (part facilement après un repas, mais à essayer sur lèvres exfoliées, sans produits)Le produit est dosable, donc si vous voulez un résultat plus voyant vous pouvez réappliquer. Pour les résultats naturels, faites attention, c’est quand même assez concentré (1-3 points pour les joues, 1 passage pour les lèvres donne un résultat naturel sur peau claires à très claires)Le produit n’irrite pas, ne brûle pas, ne donne pas de boutons (et pourtant j’ai la peau qui réagit facilement).Le produit n’assèche pas la peau non plus.Une fois le produit appliqué et estompé avec les doigts, un peu d’eau et de savon et ça part tout de suite!L’applicateur est un applicateur en mousse, comme pour les gloss, donc très pratique à appliquer sur les joues et lèvres. (Contrairement au packaging Benefit qui donne un pinceau)Dès fois j’en met sur les yeux pour un peu de couleur.Globalement, je suis très satisfaite du produit, qui fait se qu’il est destiné à faire.Ne payez plus 25€ pour un produit qui peut vous coûter bien moins et faire le job tout aussi bien !

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Lipstick 9.5 g, 02 Cherry Ade
title: Fast delivery, pretty color, nice buy
review: It arrived in just a few days, which I was really suprised about. Very lightweight, doesn't feel like there's anything on your lips but it is a little bit tacky. One star off because I feel like it doesn't stay on for as long as a tint should. Still pretty good and only have to reapply few times a day.

On cheeks it literally gives clown look because it’s almost impossible to blend. Ohh n good luck using fingers to blend cz the best it does is stain your fingers and nothing else.

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Superb🫶🏼
review: I wish I’d never discovered and took heed of all the hype and fuss over these wonderful lip inventions!.It’s costing me a fortune!.They have so many drop dead gorgeous colours to choose from that it’s overwhelming.This product just makes your lips look fantastic.And helps you on the way to the Brigitte Bardot,Angelina Jolie full pout you’ve always yearned for!.Yes,it’s like a lip gloss but with a big difference,it makes your lips look so juicy and plump and leaves a stain at the same time.And what’s more with the nude,sheer and natural colours that give you’re lips a slight pop of colour to brighten you’re pallor.And what’s more it looks completely natural and like you’re lips are naked and moist as if they are all you’re own!.It has to be said that the colour selection is fabulous and ahead of the game.Based on all the juicy fruits.There are colours for absolutely everyone and every skin tone.You may have to sample a good few to hit on the right one (or ones) for you.Experiment and try different colours,but that’s the fun!.There are also intenser colours perfect for winter,to give you the red frozen lips look and plum and sangria colours to give  you a slightly red wine stained mouth,that is in fashion right now.It has a sumptuous feel to the lips and after you apply it you’re lips go slightly darker. The only thing is you won’t be able to buy just one, you’ll probably want to sample many of the whole range!.It just makes you’re lips look better,fuller and juicier and everyone will want to kiss you but you’ll not be able to let them because you won’t want to smudge you’re lip gloss!,but it won’t matter because you’re lips are stained and the colour won’t come completely off anyway!. I recommend you try it.Because it very well might become one of your makeup ‘must haves’.And try ‘mulled peach’ out if you like the natural lips look it’s stunning,it gives you’re lips a slightly soft and beautiful pop of colour that makes you look glowing and healthy!.This one suits most skin tones.And one of the best ones I’ve tried so far.Go on,treat yourself to one!.Enjoy!. X
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 February 2024

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Everything Is Just Peachy!.
review: Seriously addicted to Juicy Lasting Tints and the Glasting melting balms.Total game changers in all things lippy!. Since I’ve discovered the Juicy Tints I’ve invested in many colours. There is a huge variety,much more than other cosmetics brands.And the colours are divine and to die for.Literally for every skin tone and every personal choice.There’s the ‘ mlbb’ colours for those of us who want our lips as natural as possible but only more beautiful and slightly blushed and the darker shades to add more intensity and stand out.Now I’m in my 50s and have pretty much given up my beloved red lipstick as I find it bleeds into the new fine lines around my lips and looks to harsh (although I did buy the Cherry Bomb and deep sangria,I just couldn’t help myself!).I tend to stick to the more natural and almost naked shades like Bare grape and Nucademia,Bare fig, Figfig etc.But of them all Mulled peach is the one that really makes me glow.It’s just a beautiful shade and one that will suit most skin tones.Naturally toned and a soft delicate shade with a glowing peachy pop of colour that automatically brightens your pallor and makes your skin ethereal and healthy looking.If you haven’t tried this one please give it a go,it’s so flattering.A bit like a peachy rose!.I’m trying not to check out any more colours as I’ve got more than enough and I always end up buying another one.If you like Mulled Peach,you will probably love Almond Rose too It’s gorgeous , go on take a peek!.Might as well treat yourself to one!. X

title: Bueno, bonito, barato
review: Es muy parecido al labial de Rare Beauty. Aunque éste es menos cremoso y tiene más alcohol. Color muy bonito y cómodo en los labios. No reseca demasiado aunque no es hidratante. Se va el brillo pero queda un color sutil en los labios. Recomiendo hidratar bien los labios antes de su uso ( como con todos los labiales ;)Tengo ganas de probar más de la marca.

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: buen producto
review: Buen producto, no reseca los labios, color vivo y hermoso, solo que no fue el que pedí, pomelo y me llegó 17 plum coke

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Enviado roto
review: El producto es bonito pero me llegó roto, intente que me lo remplazaran pero no encontraba forma de contactar.

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: "Juicy Perfection: Rom&nd Juicy Lasting Tint in 25 BARE GRAPE Review"
review: (Used by Wonyoung) The Rom&nd Juicy Lasting Tint in shade 25 BARE GRAPE is a true gem in the realm of lip tints. From its juicy and glossy finish to its long-lasting formula, this tint embodies everything I look for in a lip product.One of the standout features of this tint is its highly-pigmented formula. With just one swipe, it delivers a rich and vibrant color payoff that instantly elevates any makeup look. The shade 25 BARE GRAPE is the perfect MLBB (My Lips But Better) hue, adding a touch of sophistication and natural beauty to my lips.What sets this tint apart is its moisturizing properties. Despite its long-lasting formula, it doesn't dry out my lips like some other lip products tend to do. Instead, it keeps my lips feeling soft, supple, and hydrated throughout the day, thanks to its nourishing ingredients.I appreciate how versatile this tint is. Whether I'm going for a clear and natural makeup look or building up the intensity for a more dramatic effect, the Rom&nd Juicy Lasting Tint delivers every time. Its glossy finish adds a touch of dimension to my lips, giving them a plump and luscious appearance.As a fan of K-beauty products, I'm delighted to have discovered this gem. The 5.5g / 0.2 oz size ensures that I can take it with me wherever I go, making it the perfect lip companion for daily wear.In summary, the Rom&nd Juicy Lasting Tint in shade 25 BARE GRAPE is a must-have addition to any makeup collection. Its juicy finish, long-lasting formula, and highly-pigmented color make it a standout product in the world of lip tints. Whether you're a K-beauty enthusiast or simply looking for a reliable lip product, this tint won't disappoint.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 February 2024

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Li volevo provare da tanto e sono stupendi!
review: Stupendi, molto naturali, lasciano un po' di colore una volta che viene via l'effetto gloss e il profumo è spaziale

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Very nice
review: Beautiful formulation, absolutely loved it .

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Absolutely stunning!
review: I've been using different lip tints for such a long time. And I tell you, this is one of the best tints I've tried! Delivery was bril, came earlier than expected which was good. Packaging is spot on and it's got a nice fruity smell to it that can be quite addictive. It's simply easy to apply and has that glossy yet natural finish. My partner even agreed and said my lips looked naturally plump after applying them. It's just a great product for daily use, will Def get a handful after they've all been used. ❤️
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 December 2023

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Muy bello
review: Lo adoro, el único inconveniente es que reseca bastante los labios

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Muy bonitos
review: Mantiene el brillo y el color por mucho tiempo.

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Gutes Produkt
review: Die Lippentönung hat eine schöne Farbe (nicht zu auffällig, aber auch nicht zu dezent).Die Haltbarkeit könnte etwas besser, aber für ein paar Stunden reicht es

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: No lasting
review: Sorry its not last at all. Just 1 hour last on my lips. to water
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 September 2023

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Good lipstick
review: Product come in good condition and long expiry date👍🏼.

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Ew
review: Not a pretty color, looks cheap and dries lips out.

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Precioso
review: El color es perfecto y queda muy bonito

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Grape shade
review: Very pretty colour , loved the produt

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Good
review: I like this product. Unlike other tints that I bought on Amazon from the same brand, this came unopened and brand new which makes me really happy as it was my last purchase from this brand before giving up ( I bought 3 before and return them as they were open and used). The product smell great and look beautiful on the lips. I recommend it but be aware that they might not arrived in new condition.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 November 2023

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Not impressed with color
review: Maybe it’s not for. Color was not as expected. Returned it but didn’t get a refund. Will never buy with this seller again. Friendly advice just get your make ups from reliable store at least you can return it and won’t get stuck with stuff you don’t need.

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Lasting yes, but not "juicy" look
review: I got 07 Jujube thinking it was an orange-y or soft brown-y red tone tint with fresh glossy buildable look & texture like the sample photos, but it was rather a solid dark smokey red/pink paint. Maybe it just didn't work on my lips and I expected too much, but I wasn't too impressed.It definitely stains your lips so if you apply one coat, leave it on for a bit and press a tissue over it to remove the tint then reapply another coat, the dark red/pink colour will stay on even after the surface colour is being wiped off.If you are looking for a tint with strong/unique colour then this does the job, but if you are after some sheer juicy buildable result like the sample photo then this isn't.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 March 2023

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Good
review: Great colour gradient.

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Bares grape malisimo
review: Malisimo un gloss pegajoso igual que los demás pero ni siquiera sabes cómo te va a quedar de color en la foto una cosa y en tus labios otra , pica nada más ponerlo tiene granulitos y no se por que , pegajoso como cualquier gloss y se quita al beber o comer ,  una castaña , no lo recomiendo para nada

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Color diferente
review: Muy bonito, se siente hidratante, pero el color es más brillante del que parece en las fotos. Es un rojo intenso, no tira a marrón como parecía en la foto. Aun así es bonito

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: It’s very moisturising and pigment gradually gets darker
review: First of all the scent is amazing wtf?? It’s like actual grapes and the formula is so moisturising, it is very beige kind of colour when first applied but it gradually looks like the one in the picture. It’s a perfect mlbb type of tint very suitable for daily use 👽👽 i recommend it

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: I love this tint
review: It smells and tastes so gooddddd. It also looks stunning and is perfect to create that signature Korean lip ombre look, or just put a straight tone over your lips. It's a little more pigmented than a tint, but definitely is still transluscent. It's kind of moisturizing, but my lips still feel a little dry once it has completely worn off. It does take quite a while to wear off, too! And even when it fades, it holds the dewy feel for longer and a slight tint of color stays longest of all except if you drink or eat.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 February 2024

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: It's so creamy and smells good
review: I got pomelo skin and its natural enough to wear for school:)
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 January 2024

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Very beautiful liptint but...
review: It's a very beautiful lip tint! You gotta first blend it out with your finger, than put a thick layer in the middle of your lips and let it sit to form the shine and than blend it out again and add more. It also tints really nicely and I had it on my hand for 1 and a half days. But...1. Sadly the tint doesn't last long on my lips for some reason :/ like on my hand and cheeks it lasts long but not on my lips. Maybe I lick them too much or they're too moisturized lol2. It's not as dark as the pictures show :( it's more bright (as you can see in different lighting)3. It's cheaper on yesstyle but I only found out after my husband already bought it off of Amazon

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Ottimo prodotto
review: Il prodotto è ottimo, è un gloss / rossetto di colore molto naturale. Mi piace molto. La marca d'altronde è una garanzia!

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Tint
review: Es el color Almonde Rose y está muy bien. Estoy sorprendida por la calidad y me parece que se fabrican en Corea porque pone origen Republic of Corea.Muy buen producto y huele genial 👌

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Great
review: Like the product. The colour is fantastic and true to the picture! (20) but it's not exactly a tint because it faded since half an hour.Will use everyday, moisturising and the colour is super
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 November 2023

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
review: Ve ne innamorerete! Colore stupendo sulle labbra e poi è leggero sulle labbra😊

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Very pigmented and lightweight!
review: I purchased this in the custard mauve shade and I am in love!!!  It feels very watery when applied and has a softly whipped texture.  It has a more satin finish, but it doesn't feel drying or heavy.  The scent is lightly fruity and isn't overpowering.  This shade is not too dark, which is something I encounter with some mauves.  It does stain the lips slightly and has a pretty decent wear time.  I would definitely say it can last through a meal or two!  This shade is gorgeous when blended over the natural lip line. I am eager to try more shades and see if they live up to the expectations that this one sets!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2024

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: かわちい
review: 色がちょーかわいい✨大好き

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: ミューテッドサマーはこれを買うべし
review: 色味神です。ミューテッドサマー、ブルベ夏だけど特にパキッとした色は似合わないんだよな〜という方におすすめです。なりたすぎる色。

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: So schön
review: Das Produkt kam problemlos an und ist sehr empfehlenswert. Koreanische lippenprodukte sind sehr leicht und qualitativ!!

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Nice tinted lip gloss
review: I like how it's hydrating and it doesn't ry my lips out. The tint also stays on for a very long time which I like.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 February 2024

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: さらさらの付け心地
reviewer: 安岡宏枝Amazon カスタマー
review: 発色もテクスチャーも軽め重ねて塗ると、ハッキリとカラーがのりますこの色はブルベ向き

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Beautiful texture BUT WOC: the color deepens more than shown.
review: I love the watery texture and soft dry down but this chase custard mauve drys down a lot deeper and darker than advertised. I have a medium skin tone and this was the shown shade upon application the. Became a deeper plum or magenta once dry. I would buy a light shade if you are going for your mlbb or beautiful dry rose or nude.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 December 2023

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: ブルベ夏は買うべき！
review: ブルベ夏、ブライトサマーリップモンスター7.13をいつも使っていましたが、ドンピシャではないなぁ〜と思っており、こちらを購入。色味が最高すぎる！くすみもなく、明るすぎでもなく馴染む！！速攻、もう1本購入します。30代半ばでやっと人生で1番のリップを見つけました。ブルベ夏の方は、買ってみるべき。普段レビューは投稿しませんが、あまりにも感動してレビューしました。

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Pretty good
review: The product has nice shine and color, I expected it to be a bit brown than pink since that was what was shown in the image selection. Overall great product with nice stain.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 February 2024

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: 思った色と違った
review: 若い子向けの色と残り方も、若い子むけの色かなって思いました個人的に。近所用にします。

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: comfortable!
review: very pretty color, subtle but pretty. feels so nice on the lips and it just glides on so easily and effortlessly. vry much recommend!!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 February 2024

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: やばいのきた！
review: 本当にこの上なくサイコー。

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Lightweight, cute color, fav lip stain
review: I really love this lip stain because I think it compliments any skin tone. You can apply a light layer, and it is buildable. I have found lip stains to be annoying at times because I always wanted a natural color that could be worn for any occasion. This would be the one to get for sure!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 January 2024

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: かわいい‼️
review: 手に試しに塗ってみたらめっちゃいい感じに発色してくれました💞🎶

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Good, but prefer bare grape
review: Honestly the color is quite similar to romand’s bare grape, but i prefer bare grape. This applicator leaks a lot when i close the tube, and it doesn’t smell as good as bare grape. It’s a little bit of a warmer pink than bare grape but finish is glossy like bare grape as long as you don’t smack your lips.Overall if you’re looking for a romand lippie, get bare grape instead. That one doesn’t leak and smells like strawberries.

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Long-lasting tint, sheer yet pigmented and very buildable, not super moisturizing
review: I love this gloss. It's pretty long-lasting - the glossiness wears off pretty quickly (I add shine by using the Romand lip water gloss over top - it's really amazing). I'd say the tint lasts about 3 hours.One swipe is actually quite pigmented. If you want it more sheer, you can add a few dollops and rub it in with your finger. If you want it more pigmented, it's definitely really buildable!If I want the color to be pigmented, I like to dab my lips with tissues after applying to leave the tint, then layer another layer on top and repeat. This add pigment to the stain, rather than just the product.I wouldn't say it's super moisturizing, but since there is absolutely no transfer after dabbing your lips, I can easily add lip balm without ruining my lip balm.I have pretty fair and cool-ish skin and I found the Salty Peach shade to be too peachy for me. Canyon is absolutely perfect - it's a light brick color which is a bit darker than my natural lip color. This makes the perfect color (for me) to wear a red lip without committing to a red lip. In my opinion, Canyon is really great for both warmer and cooler months.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 July 2023

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Leaks! *update solved*
review: Update! So I was googling and haven’t seen anyone find a solution for this leaking, it seems it wasn’t from being tilted even upright it was leaking and it seems the product was being pulled upwards from the crevices where it can come apart (the part other reviews show broke) so I put a thin coat of super glue all around it and that seems to have stopped it from getting messy! This is an unavoidable issue with this product and rom&nds packaging so if you love their lip tints I highly suggest doing this even if it’s not currently leaking, because it eventually willHad to leave this review since no one talks about it, the lip tint is amazing long lasting and dewy so beautiful and the packaging is sleek and pretty BUT it leaks so bad! You have to keep this upright at all times, it’s not a one-off defective product it will always leak, so be aware if that will be an issue for you

prod_name: KIKO Milano Long Lasting Colour Lip Marker 106t
title: Spero con tutto il cuore che nessuno lo avesse già usato 🤢
review: Colore: OK, anzi, stupendo (ho ricevuto tanti complimenti)Lunga tenuta: ASSOLUTAMENTE SI' (messo al mattino e alla sera era tale e quale)No-transfer: CONFERMO, una volta seccato crea come una pellicola che quasi non la togli piùMA...c'è un grosso ma, purtroppo!!Già alla seconda applicazione ho fatto fatica a metterlo perché il colore scarseggiava e faticava ad uscire.Ho provato in tutti i modi, ma sembrava come esaurito. Colore zero, sparito. La confezione era intatta per carità e l'applicatore non presentava segni di "manomissione"/usura, ma è anche vero che i trucchi di KIKO arrivano sempre senza sigillo di garanzia (grandissima pecca) per cui mi è salito l'enorme sospetto che quello stesso rossetto potesse essere già stato usato da qualcun altro...che orrore!Preferisco pensare che si sia trattato di un caso isolato, magari di una rimanenza di magazzino, perché altrimenti...Inutile dire che l'ho restituito immediatamente, ma, visto che tutto sommato la qualità era ottima, il prezzo molto buono e per voler dare una seconda chance al prodotto, ho provveduto a ordinarne subito un altro di un colore differente e questa volta devo dire che...Si è ripresentata la stessa situazione: dopo solo un paio di applicazioni, il prodotto si è completamente scaricato! 😰 L'ho reso immediatamente e chiuso definitivamente con questo prodotto!Una cosa del genere è inaccettabile, soprattutto da un'azienda così conosciuta come KIKO.Voglio sperare di essere stata così sfortunata da incappare per due volte in un lotto difettoso...Bocciatissimo 👎👎

title: Not good ingredients but works well
review: I bought this without any ingredient list. I don’t like putting garbage chemicals and cancer causing chemicals on or in my body, and these are full of them, plus artificial colors. I thought maybe they were more natural as the advertising talks about fruit and nutrients but there’s pretty much none of that in it.If you don’t care about chemicals, this is a stain for you. It works well. It’s also build able. Not dark enough? Apply another later. I got Dracula red and it is quite dark for me as I have an actual natural lip stain from 100%pure that is more dark pinkish dark berry color.  I wanted something that goes better with dark red clothes but couldn’t find anything truly natural. Might try making my own someday.  Anyway, my photos are attached and it is seemingly darker red than the photos seem to show but it’s a nice red color.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Messy.
review: Too bright red for my taste.

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Perfect!
review: I was looking for a lip color for a special event where there'll be lots of eating and drinking, so knew I wanted a no fuss stain. Starting with the color, Dracula Red, it's absolutely perfect. It could probably work well as stage blood! It smells phenomenal, but not overpowering. Most importantly it lasts on the lips. I applied it, let it dry down, then blotted. I put a similar colored gloss on top after blotting. The stain was still there even after the gloss wore away. In fact, it lasted for hours. I think I may need every color of this product. I can't believe how little I spent on it for the quality I got!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Dyes everything-good or bad
review: I’ve been looking for a new lip tint since so many are discontinued. This is VERY tinted and pretty but be careful to put it on a tiny bit at a time and let dry or your teeth will look like you’ve been chomping at fake blood capsules for hours.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Kinda sticky
review: I like this stain overall. It’s definitely sticky at first but that fades. I wish it lasted a bit longer! Good product all things considered.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Worth it
review: I really want a stain that STAINS and stays on my lips without much maintenance. This was prob one of the better/best lip ones I've used. It's better and longer lasting than many high end products (looking at you fenty poutcicle), and more saturated than I was expecting.I got the shade Dracula Red and it went on as a bold fuchsia/red that faded to a nice deep rose over time. Not too much for everyday wear in my opinion. The consistency is really light and watery, and dries down to feel like almost nothing. Gloss/balm over top doesn't take it off, and it lasted through eating and drinking.My only complaint is it does fade over the day and look a little spotty (my center lip fades faster than the edges), but it fades nicely and reapplies easily. I'd like more color variety as looks like most are similar pink/red shades and I'd love a brighter orange, coral, hot pink. I will prob get another though - for the price it can't be beat!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 October 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Absolutely amazing
review: I would buy this again and again, perfect lip tint, long lasting and it’s so pigmented that a little goes a really long way. The price is absolutely amazing as well. I am still using mine that I got in september and it’s not even half way done!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 January 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Just ok
review: It is very very sticky, and a lip stain is meant to be applied, allowed to set for a few minutes, then wiped off leaving your lips stained. This reminds me more of a child drinking red stuff than it does a quality lip stain. I probably would not try it again.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Amazing blush 🦋
review: If you do have pigment it won't show up as much as a tint . So I use it as a lipstick rather than tint on lips & it's very good to use as a cheek tint, very long lasting and the shade is beautiful ✨ I got it for ₹360 ❤

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: very good 👍
review: its super good but be careful because it STAINS
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 January 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Messy
review: The color stays fairly well, but be careful - it stains everything it touches!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 January 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: A good TRUE red! that stays put!!
review: Shade RD302/Dracula Red. Wicked stoked about the color here - I have other tints from Etude and other brands and a lot of them pull pink. Taste is a bit weird on application but goes away pretty quickly; dry down is really fast and the color STAYS PUT.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Same formula as the ice cream series
review: I love Etude house's watery tints.When applied full strength, it gives a very dramatic look.When blurred out, it gives off a healthy glow.Makes a cute blush in a pinch, too.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 November 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: It’s Great!
review: Fabulous colors! Glides on easily; gently fades. A little goes a long way…
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Uneven stain
review: Great color and very long lasting, however it applies very splotchy for me. Whenever I use it, it looks terrible on my lips after 10 minutes because it divides along my lip lines. Also bleeds into my teeth when first applying, but I would not mind if the color went on more evenly. Almost embarrassing to wear because the splotchiness is difficult to even remove so my whole day has weird uneven colored lips
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 November 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: RD302 not really red
review: Was hoping for a maroon red, which is what the product pictures show. When you put this on it is thin and wet, and doesn’t really dry down so you have to blott or wipe it off. Once you wipe it off it’s bright pink. The picture I added shows what it looks like before you wipe it off, and then after you wipe it off. Seems to stain just fine if you like the color pink, just wasn’t what I was looking for.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 March 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: I only wear lip stain and I have yet to find a perfect one.
review: This goes on a little thick, but if I work with it enough it does a nice deep red that I can cover with chapstick and get away with a couple hours. It doesn't transfer like the others but I do have to let it dry first. I wouldn't recommend using gloss on top of it only chapstick because otherwise it'll run.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 November 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: I love it!
review: It’s a lil sticky but I don’t mind. I got Dracula red and might get a browner shade later like sweet potato. It has a faint fake grape scent that’s reminiscent of the lip glosses I wore as a little girl and I love it. Taste good lol. Only down fall is longevity could be a tad better but it’s good enough for the price. I have Dracula red and the picture is of only one application
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 March 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Comes off fast but tastes good
review: I honestly really liked the smell and taste of it. It kinda tasted like grapes lol. However it doesn't last that long and will come off easily with drinks and food. It also stains my lips unevenly sooo idk
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 December 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Strange scent in the tube of tint
review: I love the color. But the tint itself has some kind of smell similar to gasoline. It goes away after a while, which is good, because the tint really does stay on once it’s applied!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Pigment is okay and lasts long but is drying and has a very strong scent.
review: I like the pigment of this stain and its staying power. However, it dried out my lips terribly so I stopped using it. Also, it has a very strong candy-like fragrance that I did not care for. I’m usually okay with subtle fragrances but this is too much.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 November 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Good color
review: This product imparts a great tint.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 October 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: WORKS OK, GOOD PRICE
review: GOOD COLOR, EASY TO APPLY AFTER A LITTLE PRACTICE
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 March 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
review: Perfect!! Easy not messy. I don’t wear makeup often or lipstick pretty much ever but I’m in love.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 October 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: TERRIBLE. Chemical smell, accentuates lines
review: This will sink into any lines on your lips and just look like a hot mess after about 3 minutes. The worst part is the smell. It is the most chemical cherry smell, almost smells like a cleaning product to me. The smell is so off putting that I honestly don't feel safe putting it on my mouth. I chucked it into the bin after trying it out. I don't understand the rave reviews!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 February 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: It’s thiccccccc
review: I thought this was going to be a very sheer tint that is buildable but let me tell you this stuff is thick. The color is very vibrant even if you put a little bit on. Mine smells and tastes a bit like artificial cherry not too bad. I just think it’s not a everyday wearables color for my own preference. If you like a very vibrant string color you’ll like this but if you wanted a sheet buildbake color like me I would say stay away
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 December 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Better than Benetint hands down. Bought 4 more.
review: Perfect stain tint  stays in place forever better than Benetint , hands-down the best laptop I’ve ever used bought five of them run don’t walk
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 July 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Worth buying
review: I really like the product it's give me effortlessly pinkish red lips. Long lasting

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Meh
review: Little bit disappointed with the product. I got the Dracula red color and it’s pretty but stains so fast!you have to apply the right amount of tint or you will definitely have harder time removing the stain. Also, I didn’t like the strong fruity smell, it smells like a cough syrup
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 February 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: More fushia than blood red
review: I got Dracula Red and it is way more fushia toned than the photo. It is definitely not a blood red but more pink/purple toned. Pretty if you want that color, but this is rarely a color that goes with my coloring (fair skinned with dark reddish brown hair…I need the blood reds or warm reds).Disappointed, would order another color but since this one was off from the pic I’m afraid to. It is saturated and has staying power, so those are the good things.Idk… maybe the company will see this review and ship me a true Dracula color like the pic…one can dream lol
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 January 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: I truly do not understand all the rave reviews
review: This has such great reviews I HAD to try it because my holy grail product would be a lip stain that actually stays on. This… does not. I bought 3 colors, two of them darker reds. One is absurdly bright/garish when first applied and leaves only a barely noticeable stain if blotted. The other is a gorgeous deep red that is beautiful with two or three coats (blotted in between). The problem with all three is that the stain doesn’t even last an hour after you apply it. If you eat, drink, or lick your lips, it’s GONE. Also, if you lick your lips, it WILL get on your teeth.I don’t know if all the rave reviews have some secret to the way they apply it, but the product I received absolutely did not live up to those reviews.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 May 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Shade
review: This is not the same shade as it used to be. Rather than a reddish color it is more pink  I ordered 2 thinking it was the shade it used to be but no. It's a very good product. Non stick, sheer, shiny. But I'm upset with the shade. Because I really wanted the darker reddish shade it used to be.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 July 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Horrible taste - Buyer beware
review: I wanted to like this lip tint as it looked quite decent on application- but it immediately tastes so bad I had to spit it out. I seldom have this reaction. There must be something in it that doesn’t agree with me. It’s going in the garbage.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 January 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Good

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Finally a true STAIN!
review: I’ve tried a few lip stains, but often they’re formulated like a lipstick, or are too watery to actually build up pigment.This feels like a lip gloss with a gel base, it goes on smooth, and depending on how long you leave it on before wiping, leaves behind enough color to look stained!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 April 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Love it
review: Love it and doesn’t dry out lips.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 March 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Very running and stains. Does not stay on lips.
review: Running stains skin but not lip skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 January 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Stays on all day!
review: I bought this for work and it did fade a little after lunch but the color was still there when I washed my face for bed.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 August 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Don’t buy
review: this is the most disappointing lip stain I have ever used. Does not last even a few hours. Don’t waist your money on this. I wish I could get my money back. Negative stars.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 November 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Not worth  buying
review: Over hyped product if it is real , It stinges , the sticker was off , gives you gola khake aya look . bad delivery and packaging.

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Uneven stain
review: The stain was uneven and rubbed off easily. Somehow, this lip tint stained my bottom lip but not my upper lip, which was very weird. The scent was like rubbing alcohol and really unpleasant. The tint also dried out my lips and made them flake.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 March 2022

prod_name: Revlon Kiss Cushion Lip Tint 4.4ml 250 HIGH END CORAL

prod_name: Revlon Kiss Cushion Lip Tint 4.4ml 250 HIGH END CORAL
title: Carino
review: Me gustó el color entre burgundy y vino, es suave, tiene una textura entre gloss y labial cremoso, pigmenta de forma media, tienes que darle varias "pasadas" para que pigmente bien y tienes que dejarlo secar para que no transfiera. Me gusta el aplicador pero al inicio se batalla para que salga el tinte. En general está muy lindo.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss Cushion Lip Tint 4.4ml 250 HIGH END CORAL

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Smooth Whip Matte Lip Cream
title: Love it
review: I'm crazy about this colour, and I do like the fact that this lippy doesn't taste weird or make my lips tingle for once. However, it does dry my lips out if I use it too much, so gotta use it sparingly. Other than that, the colour stays put and it looks amazing, so I can't complain :)

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Smooth Whip Matte Lip Cream
title: Creamy and great!
review: Color is really nice, feels soft, and can be easily removed with a wipe.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 February 2024

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Smooth Whip Matte Lip Cream
title: Tolle Farbe!
review: Creamy matte texture. Loved the color too. Pretty close to shown on website

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Smooth Whip Matte Lip Cream
title: Precioso!!
review: Der Lippenstift lässt sich gut auftragen und ist super pigmentiert. Hält nur nicht ganz so lange auf den Lippen. Würde ihn mir trotzdem wieder kaufen :-)

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Smooth Whip Matte Lip Cream
title: klebrige konzistenz trocknet die lippen aus!
review: Es un labial precioso deja una sensación de hidratación y de suavidad, además tiene un color precioso, también dura bastante puesto aunque bebas y comas, pero si quieres más intenso el color después de beber o comer te lo tendrás que retocar, me encanta la sensación que deja en los labios, es muy bonito, sin duda lo volvería a comprar

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Smooth Whip Matte Lip Cream
title: Bought 4 extras
review: qualität lässt zu wünschen übrig!pickt, lässt sich nicht gut auftragen….. farbe entspricht nicht

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Smooth Whip Matte Lip Cream
title: No es lo esperado
review: I absolutely love this lipstick, the smoothness, the colour, the smell, everything! Would definitely recommend, I get so many compliments. I actually bought 4 more tubes for friends.

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Smooth Whip Matte Lip Cream
title: Teddy fluff
review: Había leído maravillas...y nada que ver. No es duradero en absoluto, se desperdiga por los alrededores de la boca y nada de darle dos pasadas porque queda grumoso. Mejor invertir en uno de YSL, que son caros pero los más duraderos que he probado.

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Smooth Whip Matte Lip Cream
title: Ich liebe es!
review: Beautiful shade a bit darker than expected but still love .. tastes great too like toffee  ..
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 July 2023

prod_name: Revlon Kiss™ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: Great lip balm ,nice colour.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss™ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: Smells nice.Glides well , leaving a nice shine on your lips.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss™ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: Good and moisture lip balm but the colour...What is going on with this lip balm colour? its so red that it almost looks like red lipstick. First, I was unawear of this colour and i smeared on my lips, I did not relized until a friend told me and I looked in the mirror I look like clown.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss™ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: I love it! It smells so sweet and i just love the colour. If you live in Australia like me, if u get this make sure to put it in the fridge straight away! If u apply it on your lips it'll put too much since it's melted. So make sure to put it in the fridge. Sadly, i dropped it on the floor and it just splatted on the ground :(. It's completely my fault since it slipped out of my fingers. 10/10 and you should totally get it.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss™ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: Beautiful colour and smell but no longevity. Barely lasts an hour before having to reapply.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss™ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: This smells like bubble gum and is a really pretty pink shade. The top, shiny layer wears off quite quickly but the underlying layer lasts for hours. I took the advice of other reviewers from Australia who said to put it in the fridge before opening which was a great idea! I love this product. It was such a good price and arrived the next day. Very happy!

prod_name: Revlon Kiss™ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: A lovely light balm with some sunscreen.  Doesn't last very long but is very smooth and easy to reapply. I wouldn't leave it in a hot car or in the sun though!

prod_name: Burt's Bees 100% Natural Moisturizing Lip Shimmer
title: GREAT LIP BALM
review: If you like a sheer lip color, this works great and feels really good on your lips.  Much better than lipstick.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 February 2024

prod_name: Burt's Bees 100% Natural Moisturizing Lip Shimmer
title: Lovely colour and moisture
review: Really love these. I can't wear lipstick because it dries my lips out, these are perfect for adding colour but staying comfortable. The colour can be subtle or intense depending on how much you choose to apply.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 February 2024

prod_name: Burt's Bees 100% Natural Moisturizing Lip Shimmer
title: Bello
review: È effettivamente un formato un po' piccolo, adesso vedremo quanto durerà. Non lo metterò ogni giorno perchè comunque il colore si vede parecchio quindi lo userò solo in alcune occasioni. Sicuramente ideale per quando si vuole colorare le labbra senza usare il rossetto. Odora di menta e mi piace molto, e si sente il fresco sulle labbra, per me è piacevole. Si stende facilmente ma bisogna stare attenti perché l'effetto "rossetto messo a cavolo" si presenta facilmente. Comunque il diametro dello stick è piccolo quindi se non si va di fretta si stende bene senza sbavature! È leggermente lucido ma non troppo per fortuna. Ora voglio vedere dopo qualche ora quanto idrata ma già dopo pochi minuti sento le labbra (che erano abbastanza secche) morbide. Vediamo se se scompare l'effetto lucido (come spero). Soddisfatta. Costicchia, ma al momento direi che ne vale la pena.

prod_name: Burt's Bees 100% Natural Moisturizing Lip Shimmer
title: Dura muito sem rançar, hidratante
review: Não rança, cabe em qualquer lado e hidrata bastante.

prod_name: Burt's Bees 100% Natural Moisturizing Lip Shimmer
title: Pinta suave y bonito!
review: No es un labial de color concentrado, pero si se nota el color, probablemente sea algo más intenso aplicándolo más veces. Hidrata bien, si cumple su función y también se siente la menta desde el primer contacto. Me gustó mucho y seguro voy a comprar más colores.

prod_name: Burt's Bees 100% Natural Moisturizing Lip Shimmer
title: Ich benutze ihn ständig…
review: Habe diese Lippenpflegestifte in allen möglichen Farben.Finde sie wirklich toll.Wichtig; man sollte sie möglichst kaum raus drehen, da man sie kaum wieder rein drehen kann und dann bricht meistens alles ab und da habe ich mich schon oft geärgert.Aber seit ich die nur noch minimal rausdrehe, halten sie auch. 👍🏻

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: UN GLOSS IDRATANTE, RIMPOLPANTE, NON FASTIDIOSO!!!!
review: Este es un gloss súper hidratante ya que contiene ácido hialuronico , deja los labios suaves y no los reseca.No tiene brillos como el moon, pero si deja los labios con lindo aspecto, tiene bastante producto, ya que es un gloss si se quita, con el pasar de las horas si se llega a quitar pero mantiene un color leve y aun sensación hidratanteObviamente si te limpias con algun papel si se va retirar el producto pero si te cuidas si dura algunas horasEl color puede producir tonos diferentes depende la cantidad de producto que uses (cómo se muestra en las imágenes) y de tu color de labiosEn general es buen producto y me encanta, se siente muy cómodo y no es pegajoso, además huele bonito

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: No
review: Brillant et hydratant mais pas super longue tenue

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: Nice product
review: Sono sincera ho utilizzato per anni rossetti a lunga tenuta, che seccavano le mie labbra, ed apparivano molto secche anche con il rossetto, non era molto estetico, ho iniziato ad applicare solo balsami labbra colorati o trasparenti, tanto sotto la mascherina non vi è molta differenza, ahime'.Ho testato molti gloss, ma l'antiestetico effetto appiccicoso, non fa per me, quindi avevo molte aspettative in questo  di " Maybelline New York Lifter Gloss, Lucidalabbra con acido ialuronico, Effetto rimpolpante e idratante '', oggetto della mia recensione.Saranno aspettative attese????Il packaging merita menzione, in quanto è veramente bello, sembra di avere tra le mani un prodotto di fascia alta, molto curato dalla grafica all'estetica, veramente promosso.L'applicatore floccato è maxi, come il trend lo vuole, ma utilissimo per l'applicazione, segue perfettamente l'anatomia delle labbra senza sbavature.§§§§§  TEXTURE & PIGMENTAZIONE §§§§§La texture è molto fluida, ma risulta molto leggera, nel senso che non da fastidio, non crea spessori, non ha l'effetto appiccicoso dei soliti gloss, l'applicazione risulta scorrevole e immediata anche grazie alla sua pigmentazione piena, almeno nella colorazione da me scelta,  ovvero '' Silk ''.Questa colorazione è un nude rosato, lo adoro in quanto si sposa benissimo con il tono delle mie labbra,  lo si puo' utilizzare sia per trucchi nude, sia per make up piu' strutturati, insomma risulta portabile in ogni occasione.Ha un effetto brillante, che pian piano si attenua, ma continua a rimanere il colore, per cui non ha una durata eccelsa, ma è un gloss, pero' rispetto ai classici lucidalabbra, resiste di piu'.Le mie labbra risultano idratate, piene e belle,  sicuramente aiuta l'effetto brillante e l'acido ialuronico  presente nella formulazione, mi trovo davvero bene, anche ad utilizzarlo con la mascherina.Sicuramente, presto provero' altre colorazioni.§§§ Colorazioni Disponibili §§§Le colorazioni non sono tante, ma credo che rispettino tutti i gusti, di seguito:- 001 Pearl  dovrebbe essere trasparente- 002 Ice, un rosa pallido- 004 Silk  la colorazione rosa nude scelta da me (vedi foto)- 005 Petal un rosa piu' scuro, ma sempre nude, questo sara' la mia prossima referenza colore.- 006 Reef un rosa chiaro- 007 Amber è il nude per eccellenza, ma con toni sul marrone, non sta bene su alcuni sotto toni, tipo il  mio, sta molto bene invece a chi ha una pelle chiara.La quantità di prodotto contenuta è di 5.4ml mentre, la durata dalla data di apertura è di circa 24 mesi.La formulazione è accettabile, troverete il dettaglio dell'inci verde, rosso o giallo, nelle foto della mia recensione, di seguito l'elenco senza dettaglio dei valori.Vi posso gia' dire, che l'acido  ialuronico  non è impiegato in grandi quantita', ma è normale, anche perche' altrimenti il costo sarebbe decisamente piu' alto, il resto degli ingredienti non è verde, ma per me è assolutamente accettabile.C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polybutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Saccharin, Sorbic Acid, Alumina, Silica, Polybutylene Terephthalate, Trihydroxystearin, Cocos Nucifera Oil / Coconut Oil, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ethylene/Va Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Tin Oxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tocopherol, Magnesium Silicate, Glucomannan, Parfum / Fragrance.La spedizione super veloce, arriva con il sigillo, per cui non corriamo nessun rischio.Personalmente, lo adoro, sia da solo, sia sopra ad altri rossetti con una texture piu' secca.Ciao

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: 003 Moon, mein Lieblings-Lipgloss
review: Ich mag an mir keine stark geschminkten Lippen, weshalb ich immer schon lieber zum Lipgloss statt Lippenstift gegriffen habe.Ich habe mich für die Farbe Moon entschieden. Sie weist dezente Glitzerpartikel und nur eine sehr dezente Tönung auf. Die eigene Lippenfarbe wird intensiviert und erhält tollen Glanz. Ich bin sehr blass und meine Lippen sind von Natur aus schon recht rötlich. Mir gefällt das Ergebnis bei mir sehr gut. Wer eher blasse Lippen im Vergleich zum Teint hat, und sich etwas mehr Tönung wünscht, sollte lieber zu einer anderen Farbnuance greifen. Die anderen aus der Reihe sind nämlich deutlich intensiver färbend. Meine Freundin, auf die das zutrifft, hat die Farbe Silk. Die steht ihr wunderbar.Typisch Lipgloss hält die Farbe auf den Lippen nicht lang. Das notwendige Nachschminken nach ca. 2 Stunden oder nach dem Essen stört mich nicht. Wer länger anhaltende Farbe sucht  wird generell nicht mit einem Lipgloss zufrieden sein.Die Ligloss der Reihe sorgen für gepflegte Lippen, sie kleben nicht und haben einen leichten Geschmack nach Kaffee. Kannte ich so noch nicht, mag ich aber sehr.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: Fabulosa!
review: Queda muy bonito puesto, huele bien y sabor placentero. No queda pegajosa.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: Se ha convertido en mi favorito
review: Lo que me más me ha gustado ha sido el precio. Lo compré en una oferta y me encantó. Sin duda se ha convertido en mi favorito. En cuanto a la duración... es un gloss, dura lo que dura.El color es bastante bonito (03 Moon) no tiene mucho color (pero te cambia mucho cuando te lo pones) y el que tiene es algo rosado. El sabor es bueno (he tenido otros con una especie de sabor a menta que no me gusta nada) Llegó bien embalado y sin marcas de uso.En definitiva, el producto me gusta y lo recomendaría.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: One of the best!
review: This lipgloss is all over tiktok!! It really is one of the nicest glosses I have ever purchased, it is now my go-to gloss whenever I go out somewhere.. the shine is so pretty, smells incredible, and not at all sticky or tacky. Easy to apply with a very spongy applicator (bigger than the usual ones) literally glides on like a dream! Will be repurchasing when I run out

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: Me encanta su color y textura
review: Me ha encantado, súper suave, me encanta la textura y el envase es súper bonito, más grande de lo que esperaba , lo único que decir que el color es más oscuro no es como en las fotos, tira más hacia marrón

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: Des lèvres repulpées et hydratées
review: Ce gloss est enrichi en acide hyaluronique, ce qui le rend unique. Non seulement il offre une brillance intense et un effet repulpant instantané, mais il prend également soin de mes lèvres en les maintenant hydratées. C'est un produit polyvalent qui peut être porté seul pour un look naturel ou par-dessus mon rouge à lèvres préféré pour une touche de brillance.J'apprécie également l'applicateur précis qui permet une application facile et uniforme, sans bavures ni dégâts. La tenue est excellente, et je n'ai pas besoin de le retoucher constamment.Le Lifter Gloss de Maybelline est un excellent rapport qualité-prix. Il me donne des lèvres irrésistibles, hydratées et pulpeuses à chaque utilisation. Je ne peux que le recommander à toutes celles qui recherchent un gloss à la fois élégant et efficace.Si vous avez été satisfaits de mon commentaire sur ce produit, n'hésitez pas à me faire savoir que j'ai pu vous aider dans votre choix. Votre retour positif est important pour moi et peut aider d'autres utilisateurs à trouver des informations utiles sur ce produit et me motive à continuer à vous proposer des commentaires constructifs sur les produits Amazon. Merci d'avance pour votre soutien !
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 November 2023

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: I think this is fake. I have others from actual shops, and this is totally different.
review: I have others in the same line from actual stores (boots, Superdrug), and this one has a different texture and is grainy, doesn’t have the same effect, is super sticky, and is sickening sweet in smell and flavour.It’s just not at all the same to the others I have from the same line.Even the outer packaging was different. A big sticker over the item, instead of the small seal.It’s just so different, something is off.I’d return it, if it wasn’t a pain in the neck.

prod_name: e.l.f. Hydrating Core Lip Shine, Happy
title: Mein neuer Favorit
review: e.l.f.'s "Klare Farbe und Sanfter Glanz" Lippenbalsam ist mein neuer Favorit! Der süße herzförmige Kern versorgt meine Lippen mit intensiver Feuchtigkeit und verleiht gleichzeitig einen Hauch von Farbe und sanftem Glanz. Die Anwendung ist super einfach – einfach direkt auftragen und von der Mitte zu den Ecken streichen. Die spürbare Pflege mit Vitamin E macht meine Lippen happy. Und der Bonus: e.l.f. setzt auf hautfreundliche Inhaltsstoffe, ist 100% vegan, tierversuchsfrei und Leaping Bunny zertifiziert. Kurz gesagt, ein fantastisches Produkt, das ich jedem empfehlen kann! 💄✨

(maybe i didn't look at the picture good enough) I guess it is moisturizers but its a little odd as i thought it was just clear plastic at first. This center also doesn't melt/wear as fast as the outer part.But other than that I like it great. I think for the price it is a solid lip balm!!!

title: So hydrating
review: It feels so smooth and hydrating. My lips haven’t felt this good in awhile. I like the way it feels when on. It feels like velvet. The hydration last for a long time. The downside is the smell. Just smells waxy or like an unscented lipstick so not awful but could be better. The color is fairly light like you just put on a tinted chapstick. That itself isn’t a problem for me because I wasn’t looking for an extreme color. But don’t expect something super pigmented or vibrant. I will be buying again but maybe next time I will try a different color. I purchased the color happy. It is a great nude color for fair skin.

title: Luscious moisture
review: I love the moisurizing and staying-power of this lipstick.  I'd have rate it a 5-star, but buying it online is very difficult because the names of the colors give NO HINT of their actual shade.  I have now purchased two that I thought were a rosy color, but were brown or orange.  Please don't name your lipsticks "lovely" or other non-descriptive words unless you will also make certain the color shown is the color of the product.

The applicator is precise, allowing for easy and even application.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: NA
review: Pros:- nice colour selection- great for a glossy look- smooth application- applicator keeps clean and easy to screw on and off- gives a plumping effect due to the glossyness  unlike the matte finish where it accentuates the lines on the lips(I dont think it actually plumps though)- buildable use less for sheer and use more for the full colourCons- doesn't last too long( I don't mind the reapplication but if you are looking for something to last you the whole day this may not be it)- can clump in the middle and around the corners of the mouth- the applicator may be a bit thick, hard to be precise but great for quick application (both a pro and a con at the same time)

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: It works , does what it's supposed to do.
review: first time I have used this product. I have had other brands in the past, including the more expensive ones, but this is I think the best of the bunch,  mixes well with lipstick colour not making very much difference. It looks coloured in the bottle, but once on your lips, is barely noticeable. I put it on about ten minutes before applying lipstick, which gives it time to 'do it's stuff'  . Lips don't tingle as much as with other lip plumpers which made me wonder whether I had made a mistake, but the results after a few minutes convinced me that this is a great product. There is a slightly sweet taste, but not at all unpleasant,  and there is a slight odour which you can smell once its on, but that again, isn't unpleasant at all. I will be sticking to this one from now on.

review: Tono súper natural, notas los labios hidratados y sin sensación pegajosa. Comparé más tonos.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: A bit of plumping effect, looks very nice.
review: Looks good, thick layer from 1 application, i've the lightest shade, but looks very nice,very natural. A bit of plumping effect exists as can feel on my lips, not chilli one, but very gentle. Happy with purchase. Was told that"oh you did an injection?" But actually its only lipstick.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Me encanta
review: Llevo ya varios botes y se notan los labios más carnosos.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Bellissimo, effetto filler!
review: Parto dal packaging che è molto semplice ma elegante, di buona qualità per il piccolo prezzo. Il colore che ho preso io è trasparente però ha una luminosità unica ed è stupendo, la caratteristica di questo prodotto è infatti che è un glosso molto lucido effetto specchio, per niente appiccicoso sembra quasi un olio di quanto è morbido e non si sente sulle labbra. Essendoci poi l’acido ialuronico penetra nelle pieghetta delle labbra e rende le labbra rimpolpate, dando un effetto lip filler! Ha un leggero sapore dolciastro che non da per niente fastidio e un leggero odore che nemmeno questo da fastidio, un gloss che devono avere tutt*.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 February 2024

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Toller Glanz und super Feuchtigkeit. 👍😊⭐
review: Kurz vorab.Nutzt den "Amazon-Liefertag".📦 Somit werden die Fahrer etwas entlastet und ebenso werden Verpackungen eingespart.♻️💡ZUM PRODUKT----------------------Wer kennt es nicht, man sieht mal irgendwo ein Werbung und dann kauft man ein Produkt und fällt dennoch total rein.Mit diesem Lipgloss passiert das allerdings nicht.Der Gloss riecht wunderbar angenehm und lässt sich spielend leicht auftragen.Die Lippen bekommen einen wundervollen satten Glanz und sind über die ganze Zeit mit Feuchtigkeit versorgt.Insofern man was isst und etwas vom Gloss am Lebensmittel bleibt, bekommt es einen leicht süßlichen Geschmack. Aber das ist nicht weiter schlimm.Ergänzt man den Lipgloss noch mit einem tollen Lipliner, dann wird das Ergebnis einfach traumhaft.✅😊FAZIT--------------Endlich habe ich einen Lipgloss gefunden, welcher nicht nur toll aussieht sondern auch meine Suche beendet hat und mir immer ein Lächeln ins Gesicht zaubert. 💋Sehr zu empfehlen. 😊

title: Solid product
review: This is a lovely lipgloss, provides a nice shine and doesn’t feel sticky like others i’ve tried. It provides a smooth, healthy look and moisturised lips. The only thing i would change if i could would be the applicator, it feels like it is slightly disintegrating and mushy. Other than that a lovely lipgloss!

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Genial
review: Genial

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Jamais déçue de ces gloss
review: C'est le 3 ème produit que j'achète de cette collection.Joli gloss, qui n'est pas collant, bonne odeur.Pour la tenue ça reste un gloss donc si vous voulez quelque chose qui tiens la journée ne vous orientez pas vers celui ci mais il à quand même bien meilleure tenue que les gloss bons marchés.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Ecco la verità!
review: Buongiorno ragazze,se vi aspettate di avere le labbra come Angelina Jolie con l'utilizzo di questo prodotto, SCORDATEVELO! Non è la sua funzione. Ho letto recensioni in cui parlano di un formicolio sulle labbra dopo l'applicazione, personalmente io non ho sentito nulla. I colori di questo gloss della Maybelline sono tutti molto belli, hanno una idratazione fantastica. Come si vede nella foto sopra, dopo l'applicazione le labbra sembrano subito più sane e piene. Non sbava e non appiccica. Profuma di vaniglia. Una pecca molto importante secondo me è la durata del colore ahimè, dopo sole 2 ore il colore svanisce e rimane solo il lucido trasparente come se avessi un normale balsamo labbra, perciò vi consiglio di portarlo con voi se vi piace avere le labbra sempre colorate come me. Nel complesso è un buon prodotto, perché il suo colore ( anche se devo rimetterlo dopo poco tempo) e la sua idratazione mi piacciono molto. Il prezzo intorno ai 6,00€ direi che è buono.Grazie per aver dedicato qualche secondo a leggere la mia recensione, spero vi sia utile.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Shiny and nice tasting!
review: Nice chunky tube and fat applicator. The product is a good balance - not sticky, not runny, and stays on pretty well, for a gloss. It has a good shine and is quite tasty! Annoyingly there is some product left at the bottom of the tube that can’t be reached now that I’m finishing it. This colour ‘002 Ice’ is colourless - if you want a tint get something darker.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Glos
review: This was a great buy as it was on sale.I love the high shine on its own or over lipstick, it’s not tacky at all.I loved it so much I went back and bought another colour!

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: NA
review: Pros:- nice colour selection- great for a glossy look- smooth application- applicator keeps clean and easy to screw on and off- gives a plumping effect due to the glossyness  unlike the matte finish where it accentuates the lines on the lips(I dont think it actually plumps though)- buildable use less for sheer and use more for the full colourCons- doesn't last too long( I don't mind the reapplication but if you are looking for something to last you the whole day this may not be it)- can clump in the middle and around the corners of the mouth- the applicator may be a bit thick, hard to be precise but great for quick application (both a pro and a con at the same time)

title: £7…Please!!!  This is very, very good.
review: Forget the expensive brands this lip gloss  is very good from Maybelline. For £7 …please…soft lips, lovely gloss…great colours to choose from. So I bought the stone colour…then ordered another and a lovely Topaz colour for the summer,

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: nice results
review: It gives a nice glow to your lips

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Maybelline lipgloss
review: This product is amazing!! Goes onto the lips so smoothly, looks very glossy and shiny and feels comfortable on the lips and smells and tastes like strawberries!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 January 2024

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Genial compra
review: Me ha encantado el brillo que da y como quedan los labios. Calidad- precio muy recomendable

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Jolis
review: Donne un beau relief aux lèvres. J'adore

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Esperaba que fuera mejor
review: Un brillo como cualquier otro el tono está bien no dura mucho para diario no está mal

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Top
review: Bellissimo colore e bellissima consistenza comprato poi ad un prezzo scontato sono diventati regali natalizi apprezzati da ragazze

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Buono
review: Lucida labbra buono con un gradevole profumo dolce tipo cocco.Da un effetto labbra rimpolpate che svanisce appena il lucido va via.Proprio come me lo aspettavo.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Labial
review: Tiene mucho brillo pero esperaba más color

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: Shiny and nice tasting!
review: Nice chunky tube and fat applicator. The product is a good balance - not sticky, not runny, and stays on pretty well, for a gloss. It has a good shine and is quite tasty! Annoyingly there is some product left at the bottom of the tube that can’t be reached now that I’m finishing it. This colour ‘002 Ice’ is colourless - if you want a tint get something darker.

review: not a big fan of these it dosnt try for ages then when it does its patchy sticky and no wear near as great as they make it out to be- wont be buying it again

prod_name: Maybelline New York Superstay Vinyl Ink Longwear Liquid Lipstick in Coy
title: NA
review: I love this colour, it's called Royal and matches Medium Brown skin very nicely, it's not too dark and bright enough for people to comment about how nice it looks. I am not used to wearing or applying long lasting lipsticks so it takes awhile for me to clear up mistakes as it really does stay on. I find if you have a few drinks, the inside of the lipstick does goes away and you can reapply. I use a clear lipstick over the top as there is a slight stickiness to it the entire time and that solves the problem. To remove it, I use Baby Oil and it comes off like magic. I have bought other colours since, and although it gets removed on the inside part of the lips, it's not so obvious with the lighter colours such as Coy. I recommend you trying this.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Superstay Vinyl Ink Longwear Liquid Lipstick in Coy
title: NA
review: Pretty happy with this lipstick, nice colour and moisturising for the lips

prod_name: Maybelline New York Superstay Vinyl Ink Longwear Liquid Lipstick in Coy
title: NA
review: Great long wearing product. Make sure you shake it up before use The colour is a little different to what I expected but I still like it. While it does remain on it stays a little tacky and never seems to feel fully dry

prod_name: Maybelline New York Superstay Vinyl Ink Longwear Liquid Lipstick in Coy

review: The colour is vibrant and goes on easily and the best part is that it really stays on - with a good amount of colour - for hours. Being a vivid red helps as they tend to stain the lips more.
