prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Perfect color for me!
review: This is such a nice lipstick! Not only is the color perfect for me, but the texture is super nice & velvety! Love this & will be buying again!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 January 2024

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Beautiful but I’m confused
review: Let me start off by saying this is a beautiful lip gloss/stick/blur tint color. I’m not sure what to call it. It says it’s a lip tint but it wasn’t a lip blur or tint on my lips. It just wore like a lipstick on me. I put it on expecting it to turn into one of those super drying and sticky long lasting lip colors, but I was pleasantly surprised when my lips stayed feeling moisturized. The transfer is bad and when you wipe it off it is gone without a tint, but if you leave it alone it is very pretty and keeps your lips moist. If you just plan on talking and looking pretty instead of eating, drinking and smooching your in the clear.  I love the color and the fact that it doesn’t get sticky and flakey, so if I am going to be in a situation where I can reapply when I eat or drink (I’ve been married too long to smooch in public anymore) then I will definitely keep this one in mind. It really is beautiful and flattering.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 August 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Love this lipstick
review: Bought one and came back to buy anoth in a different color. Goins on smoothly, doesn't smear and is long lasting. Try it, you'll really like it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 May 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Pretty good
review: Color was spot on for the picture on the web. Quality was ok, but I found a kind I like better.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 June 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Almost insulting.
review: Lipstick was turned and opened and loose out of the box. No safety seal on lipstick or the box. Material is dried out and crumbly. Doesn’t smell good. Doesn’t look good. Now I have to go return it. Thanks.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 March 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: It feels great, wonderful color,  I love it!
review: I'm already wanting to get another one or more. I loved it from the second I put it on. It looks great too, I got complements wearing it out.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 September 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Color is darker than it appears on the photo
review: I ordered 02 Savage color. It was a little darker than in the picture. It looks fine. There is not much to choose from. I went between 01 or 02 color. I think 01 is more on brown side. It doesn’t moisturize lips. So I put the tint first, and then I use any chapstick to make my lips moist. Overall, this is what I expected from it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 March 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Beautiful
review: Leaves a natural wash of color. It’s beautiful. Long lasting. Does not dry out the lips.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 September 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: No
review: I wanted to love this but the lipstick was broken inside the tube then slid to one side got messy went everywhere every time I tried using it what I had left it was just breaking off.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 February 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Tried it on and threw it out
review: Nothing like the images shown. Weird consistany. Definately not the soft, natural, "just kissed" look.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 January 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: color much lighter than appears online
review: much lighter than color appears online
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 March 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Not a fan
review: I personally was not a fan of this lipstick. I really wanted to love it because I've heard such great things about Moonshot products, but this one was not for me.Here are my thoughts:1️⃣ The color is terrible on me. I did not deduct stars for this though because color is based on personal preferences.2️⃣ This lipstick is not at all moisturizing for me as it claims it is. In fact, it has the complete opposite effect and dries my lips out, making them looks like prunes.3️⃣ The title of this product could really confuse some people shopping for lipstick. Is it a blur? A tint? A lipstain? A velvet matte lipstick? It's important to make that distinction because they are NOT all the same. What I can tell you from trying this lip product is that it feels closer to a matte lipstick for me.4️⃣ It most certainly transfers.Overall, it wasn't the worst lipstick I've ever tried, but there are much better products out there in the same price range.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 May 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Mixed Feelings
review: As a fan of Moonshot's cushion foundation, I was excited to try their Performance Lip Blur Fixing Tint. While I didn't hate this product, it didn't quite live up to my expectations as a lip tint. If you're looking for a softer, more subtle lip look, it's great. However, in my opinion, it doesn't provide the longevity I hoped for. The velvet matte finish is lovely, and the avocado protein is a nice touch. Overall, it's decent, but don't expect it to stay on for an extended period.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 May 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: NOT transfer proof - Moonshot Performance Lip Blur Fixing Tint
review: First the good stuff - this lip "tint" came in a very pretty, flattering color. It's easy to apply and looks great when you first put it on.However, since they stressed so much that it is transfer-proof in the listing, I will just say, NO, it is not transfer proof. It smudges very easily and definitely transfers. It doesn't stay on long if you do normal things like drink or eat something. It is more of a lipstick as it doesn't tint, just sits on the surface of my lips.I really wanted to like this product but I'm completely underwhelmed. Due to it not wearing long, I think the price is too much. I can buy others that stay on much better for less.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 April 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: A little paint like
review: It feels a little like paint when it goes on and is not very smooth not he lips. The color was also too red for me so I haven't been able to enjoy it much. If you wear it, I would suggest adding a lot of clear gloss over it otherwise your lips will feel like you just put a thin layer of paint on them. it's okay overall
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 April 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Lip tint in pretty colors w/cute case, but hard to get a smooth, even finish + smudges easily...
review: I ordered several of these lip tints for my teen-aged granddaughter. She is always experimenting with different styles and colors of lip products and I thought she might like these blurring tints. I chose the 'savage', 'hidden-card' & 'power hustle' colors for a fun range of shades that are not too dark or too intense. I think the tints do match the shades shown in the picture accompanying the product description pretty well. What doesn't seem to match is the velvety finish. These are referred to as a tint in one part of the description and a stain in another. They do seem closer to a tint than a stain as they are a bit messy and don't last long without smudging. This is definitely not transfer-proof. But they are a little like a lipstick in that the color sits on top of the skin instead of sinking in and unless there is a light coat, it can dry and crack. The consistency isn't really liquid(y) and it is hard to get smooth, even coverage. My granddaughter likes the colors and she says that these work best for her if she applies very lightly, blots to help with the blur effect, and then adds a lip balm afterward. The current price of $15.00 does seem a bit high to me, but the case is very cute.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 February 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Pretty color, long-lasting, non-drying💋
review: I really like so many K-Beauty skincare and makeup products and this MoonShot lipstick is one of them.I don't really get the lip blur/fix part of it but that's okay since I love this color and love the way it looks on my lips.Just be sure to wipe some of the color from the applicator or else it'll go on too thick. That's one problem with this lip stain: it is a little thick and dry-feeling while applying, and I do worry it won't last a long time in the tube. However, if I don't put too much on the sponge applicator or use my own lip brush, I can control the amount and have way better results.This color -- Knockout -- is a knockout! You can see from my photos that the color pretty well matches what they have advertised, but I thought it would be more of an orangey-red and this has more pinks in it —however it's flattering to my skin-tone so I’m not unhappy with this color at all.If I put a thin layer on my lips, this lasts a long time. I can drink, lightly kiss, and eat (as long as it's not something oily or buttery), and still have stain left over.It is maybe just a tad drying to my lips but that could also be because our humidity is so low right now and I so far don't have the urge to put lipbalm on my lips and it's been a couple of hours. It doesn't give my lips that 'cracked lip' dry look or as I wear it and drink water, etc, it doesn't start fading out in a drying way. That's a plus.The packaging is happy and pretty and the tube is very nice too. I like the more flattened top--easy to hold.I am happy with my order!Thank you for reading my reviews! ☺️
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Ok, but not for the price
review: Its like a mix between a lipstick and a matte gloss. Its 100% NOT smudge proof, and it transfers to anything that touches your lips. It doesn't feel sticky or dry out, so I did like that, and the color I got was really pretty. Its semi reminiscent of this revlon matte gloss I love, but its just way more expensive. I think the price could be a lot lower. I also feel like calling it a stain or tint is misleading. It wipes off super easy, so it doesnt stain AT ALL. And its way too opaque to be a tint. I will keep using it, because it is alright, but I wouldn't buy it again
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: lip tint
review: i like the color. goes on slightly creamy. doesn't stay on long
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 April 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Doesn't dry out like a typical matte lip stain. Beautiful color. Doesn't stay on very long.
review: The lip stain has a mousse like consistency and goes on your lips smoothly. It doesn't dry-out your lips like other “matte” products that I have used (it's more of a semi-matte). The color was beautiful and natural looking on my Mac NC30 colored skin. My lips are naturally pretty tinted so it was hard to get a "blurred look" using this product. Not really a fault of the product though.Remember to use the product properly if you are desiring a more "blurred" effect. It's really about how you apply the product versus the product itself.  It helps to layer the products and letting it dry between layers and blending in between.It does feel nice on your lips at first application. It doesn't stay on very long though (about 2 hours). Its does fade beautifully (not blotchy) if you forget reapply.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 February 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Too thick for me
review: Any tint or lip stain I’ve used is more of a liquid, gloss consistency. This is in a tube, so I expected it to be a bit more fluid. It’s like someone crushed up a lipstick and put it in a tube with an applicator. It goes on thick, which is not good on older lips. Every little crevice and microwrinkle was highlighted. If I kept it right within my lip line, it was better. The color sits on my lip. It doesn’t blend in or tint and it wipes right off even after it’s set for a bit. The color, “Keen” is more orange brown than the picture shows, where it looks more like a mauve shade On me, it looked like I’d smeared my lips with some discolored food. Not complementary to my coloring because it didn’t look like it did in the picture to me. It might be my monitor, but it’s not the same color family. I find this drying, like I do many lipsticks. I feels heavy on my lips, like a mask, and unfortunately unpleasant. Your results may vary, since this review is about my skin, my sensitivities, my coloring. I could imagine finding this product awesome, since it’s a nice product. It just doesn’t work at all for me.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 9 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: velvety texture!
review: The coral/orange red is such a pretty color and brightens up your complexion when you wear this shade. It leaves a velvety finish and you can smudge it for a subtle look. This stays on for a few hours. It does smudge on cups and can be a bit drying if your lips are not moisturized. I like applying a balm before putting this on top as cracked and dry lips with matte lippies are not a pretty sight. The brush could be smoother too.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 March 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Velvet Matte
review: I’m always on the lookout for matte long wearing lipsticks. Most lipsticks are either not long wearing, not matte or dries too quickly. I think I might have found my new favorite lipstick formula.My lips don’t feel or look dry. It is 100% velvet matte. No sticky residue or weird taste and it’s long lasting enough. I always have to reapply, regardless of the brand but the biggest thing is what I have to do to reapply. This, I can just put more over my lips, no need to completely remove. That’s a big thing for me. It’s not heavy on my lips.While I like the formula, the color is not my favorite but I can still pull it off. The color is more pinkish on my lips than what’s pictured. I would have liked it more if it’s wasn’t so bright.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 December 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Beautiful color
review: The color is nice and rich. After applying I had to wipe it off a little with tissue it seems to last longer that way. The lipstick didn’t last me all day especially when I started to eat and drink it seem to break down and also transfer on cups and cans, I needed to re-apply it two times but that’s a plus since other lipsticks I have to apply more often . I do like the blur affect  it’s a lively color, this is my first time trying a velvet type lip so I was surprised at how smooth it went on when I applied it. This wasn’t very moisturizing for me so I recommend exfoliating your lips if you have drier type lips that tend to peel, applying a moisturizer before applying this type of lipstick did help a little bit to make it look better throughout the day.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Best for smooth lips that have more volume than mine.
review: Rhythm Thru is the deeper of the two neutral-warm peachy tones that seemed to be more natural looking – due to my skin tones and natural lip tones, it came out looking more salmon orange than peachy. I found it to be more anti-smudge if you blot it on a napkin once or twice - it did not rub off on my teeth or move outside of where I placed it (I did not use lip liner of any kind for this example).I tried to coat it on thick enough to fill in the lip cracks, but it didn't seem to make a difference for me - maybe my cracks are too deep or numerous. Unfortunately in my case I felt like it made my lips look dry (even though they were not, they felt smooth and hydrated). I suppose I prefer matte lipsticks that I can put a gloss over to help make my lips appear more smooth.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Not a lip tint or stain - just an extra creamy lipstick
review: This is a creamy lipstick with a mousse-like texture. I wouldn’t call it a tint or stain. It’s a nebulous sort of product. The color is a smooth, rich berry, and very pretty.The lipstick applies very evenly. It goes on pretty thick and doesn’t really dry or sink into the lips, so any contact will lead to some color transfer. I didn’t notice significant color loss while talking or working at my desk, but it didn’t last through a meal.I wouldn’t order this again. It’s not a bad product, but I’ve found so many other lip tints that I like better that this just wouldn’t make the cut.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Soft and pretty
review: This is a neat looking bottle. It applies nicely and feels so soft on my lips. Leaves a nice pretty shade. Long lasting and comfortable to wear.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 February 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Great lip tint
review: Love the case this comes in. The color is perfect for my complexion. Stays on all day. Great value!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 June 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: A Decent Smudge-Proof Matte Lipstick for Pre-Moistened Lips
review: PROS:+ Great color+ Stays put for hours (even after eating)+ Decent doe foot applicator (no rough edges or anything weird)+ A little goes a long way so even though the tube looks smaller than average, you'll be able to make it last+ The tube is pleasing to look at and ergonomically nice to hold (it's easier to handle/hold onto while applying than other - more rectangular - products in this genre)CONS:- If your lips are dry/wrinkly, it clumps (in the photo I've attached, I was well-hydrated and had used a lip plumper before applying)- It's very thick in general and can be difficult to apply- $15 is a LOT for what it is... This is akin to Maybelline's SuperStay Matte Ink liquid lipstick (but thicker) which runs $8-11.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Nice Color, was gone by noon.
review: I chose the color called Keen. I really like the lipColor. It is soft and almost like a blush apricot color. Very nice. The lip tint is nicely packaged in a user friendly pink container with a lid that when unscrews also has the application wand attached. I am used to lip tints that actually tint the lip- then gloss is applied over. This product to me is more like a liquid lipstick in that it didn’t actually tint my lips. I applied at 7:30 before work. I didn’t eat or drink and went to the restroom at noon, and there was no color remaining on my lips. If you are looking for longer lasting lip color- this isn’t it. It is a very nice color and looked nice while on.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Color is pretty
review: I ordered this lip tint in (01) Keen it’s like a soft peach beige.The packaging is really nice. The color is pretty and that I liked but I’m not sure if the consistency was off or maybe it’s from the Avocado protein or what but mine was really thick it was smooth going on but the look was not good I took a paper towel and blotted my lips and it helped but I don’t really like the matte look. I did add some gloss and it made a big difference in the look but it didn’t last but a few hours. It’s just okay to me.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 9 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Pretty, but color is lacking!
review: I was excited to try this Korean lip tint stain. I really haven’t tried many Korean personal care products, so I was pretty pleasantly surprised with this lip tint. The stain went on nicely and did definitely have a velvet feel to it. The applicator was easy to use and it didn’t have too much product on it. The two colors I chose were pretty light, and I wish they had had more pigment to them. The stain also wasn’t as long lasting as I would’ve hoped for. The one thing I really didn’t like about the packaging was that it didn’t come sealed, so I didn’t feel exceptionally safe using it without that. The product wasn’t overly drying, which was a nice benefit, I just wish the colors would have been more pigmented than they were.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: creamy opaque liquid lipstick, matte but not drying, feels
review: Nice color, more of a dense matte lipstick opacity than a tint. No idea what they mean by "lip blur fixing tint". Basically doesnt settle into lips, sits on top? I agree with that.I applied it lightly, and totally covers with ease. I found it looked better applied a little heavier.  It doesnt last. Best when there is no intention to eat or drink. I definitely smeared my mug, and it definitely left by the time I was done eating. Pops in photos though!Very creamy feeling, lips feel moisturized. Matte doesnt look too drying. I could not get a stain out of it. I tried the "apply--blot--apply--blot--apply", and it didnt make a stain or add to the staying power.It is a lovely color- kind of a brick color, blue based. That works against my cool fair skin. My lips are pretty pink, so this just gave them a pleasant boost.I like it for the color, ease of application. Didnt leave a hot mess as it faded (very important!). Creaminess despite being matte. Other wise is not all that different than other lipsticks. I like it though
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 August 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Beautiful Velvety Lips
review: This is a very nice velvety powder type lip tint/stain.  It feels nice on. Not drying at all. The color (power hustle) is also very flattering. Applies a bit gloppy but if you smooth it out with your fingertips, it's really beautiful. You can apply just a few dots on the lips and blend it in for a light blurred tint look or go all out for a full on look. I wouldn't say it's transfer proof (I have never personally experience any lipsticks that does not transfer) so I don't know why companies keep making this claim. I only applied a single layer and after eating and drinking, I didnt have to reapply. I was still left with a decent amount of coverage. Overall, it's a good lip tint and the price is average for lip products.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Pretty soft pink
review: This review is for MOONSHOT Performance Lip Blur Fťixing Tint – Velvet Matte Liquid Lipstain. I ordered a shade of pink called  XCrush. This lipstain does what I need it to, which is stain my lips with a flush(when applied lightly & rubbed in) of soft pink to enhance my lips. It is more opaque if applied normally(see photo). I always wear  lip balm over lipstain, since stains tend to be drying. I will continue to use this product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: DOESN'T MOVE - Excellent Wear Time
review: MOONSHOT Performance Lip Blur Fixing TintI am not a fan of velvet-type lipstick since it normally sticks to any crevice or wrinkle that my lips have acquired.  This lippie filled in those gaps and didn't budge all day long.  The wear time is really impressive.  The color 03 All Genre is a pink-mauve but to me, it has a bit of yellow undertone, not much but enough to appear with a slight orange tint. That tint faded a bit after I applied this.I love the container which is pretty unusual since this is a liquid lip and the packaging is hard with a standard doe foot applicator and it twists open.  This won't get lost in your purse or open easily.  The color really stays put but I did exfoliate with a sugar scrub before applying this and I also tried a lip liner which also helps with any feathering.  Feathering is minimal even with my old skin.IngredientsDimethicone, Isododecane, Silica, Dimethicone/Vinyldimethicone Crosspolymer, Tribehenin, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-10 Tristearate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Isononyl Isononanoate, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Iron Oxide Red (Ci 77491), Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Sorbitan Isostearate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trisiloxane, Propylene Carbonate, Octyldodecanol, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Myristate, Isostearic Acid, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Polyricinoleate, Maltodextrin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra Di T Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Fragrance, Yellow Iron Oxide (Ci 77492), Tartrazine (Ci 19140), Lithol Rubine BCA (Ci 15850), Black Iron Oxide (CI 77499), Brilliant Blue FCF (Ci 42090)
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 August 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Love the shade!
review: I ordered this in two shades, this is my review of the shade Knock Out. It's a super vibrant red! The tint portion is a bit misleading. This is HYPER pigmented and it does stain. I could see if you applied it and then carefully removed the excess you could get a tint effect from the residual stain, but that would be a bit contrary to any moisture benefits you might get from this product. I did let the product dry down but there was an amount that still transferred.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Long lasting
review: Beautiful color and long lasting! I used this for a vacation, so there was plenty of salt water, humidity, kissing, drinking, talking and this lip stain held up pretty well!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Beautiful!
review: This color is actually so beautiful. It feels more like a lip cream when you put it on, but it does dry down, just not enough to not transfer. For the price though, it looks nice, the packaging is cute, and it lasts a decent amount of time if you're not eating/drinking
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 December 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Not exactly as described but not terrible
review: I got this in power hustle. It’s really pretty but has a bit more of a pink undertone than a red from what it appeared online. The formula isn’t runny, glossy or really gloopy. Not quite sure how to describe it honestly. I suppose it’s kind of velvety. The applicator is okay - doesn’t smooth it out as well as my finger does. It feels kind of drying on my lips and I’m not a fan of that feeling lol. I thought this would be more of a tint thing where it didn’t feel drying but it isn’t. It does smudge and doesn’t leave a tint on your lips if you wipe it off. So it is transferable. The color is very pigmented and pretty but not quite what is advertised.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Simply Beautiful
review: A truly matte lip, I'm not too sure about the lip blur or stain part.It was not drying despite it being matte, it felt nice and moisturizing.It also didn't show every wrinkle on my lips. I tried two different shades and they were both so beautiful and creamy.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: pretty
review: This MOONSHOT Performance Lip Blur Fixing Tint is a really pretty color but I wouldn't call it a blur or a tint. It makes a pretty good matte lipstick though. It stays on for a good while as long as I don't mess with it. But if I drink anything, it comes off on my glass. So, it does transfer. It does a decent job of moisturizing while it's on and if I want a bit of sparkle, I just apply a lip gloss overtop the lipstick. This may not be the long lasting tint or blur I expected, but I'm still pretty happy with it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 January 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: not sure it worked
review: I got this in Hidden Card, which was more pink than magenta when I put it on. I understand the blurred lips concept, and I've tried using this a couple of times. It didn't feel drying to me, which is good. It did transfer after I used it, which wasn't as nice. It didn't seem to build up much at all; I tried to concentrate it on certain parts of my lips and leave the edges more blurred out, but it all looked the same. Maybe I need to watch more youtube videos...
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Pretty but a little problematic!
review: While I think this is a pretty color lippie, it doesn’t stay put!  It smears and smudges well after being applied!  I couldn’t get it to look even because it was still splotchy after the second layer.  I would probably have to line my lips really well underneath before applying it again. I feel like I’m only keeping it because the color is so pretty.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Pretty color; odd texture
review: This lip color does "blur" like the pictures indicate.  The color in person is true to the picture in the shade I received.  I don't find that my lips feel particularly moisturized when using this, but neither do they feel dried out--neutral for me on that.  The color lasts-ish...it doesn't fade completely even after quite a few hours; however, it is maybe only 50% as bright as it was on initial application.  It is very matte with absolutely no shine whatsoever.  If that is what you want & you like the color, this would be a good choice.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Non drying
review: I really like this, the color is so pretty and it does last a while however it does transfer. It wore like a regular lipstick - not tint - but is very moisturizing and non-drying plus it doesn't flake.

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint

I drank coffee and tea and the lipstick stayed on. The lipstick was dry and I applied Aquaphor to help with moisturizing.  That combination worked!

I did have some feathering around the edges, which a lipliner would probably help with.

prod_name: e.l.f. Monochromatic Multi Stick
title: Love it

With a range of flattering shades, this stick is a budget-friendly go-to for achieving a coordinated, monochromatic look with minimal effort. Highly recommended for makeup enthusiasts on the go.

prod_name: Peripera Ink Velvet #3 Red Only, 4 g
title: Great lip color that doesn't transfer
review: This was a Prime Day recommendation and I took a chance!  In short, great product for the. money. My favorite lip stain is a water based one and no longer available. This is not at all like that, but a lip color that is very highly pigmented (I got the red color) It has to be applied carefully, and since it comes with a sponge tip. For more precise application, I used a lip brush.  No problem...it stays in place, doesn't bleed. I will say it looked great immediately. Matte, which is the trend now.  I continue to wear my mask, and I could NOT believe it absolutely did NOT transfer on the mask, even after being outdoor for hours in 90 degrees with 90 percent humidity! That is amazing as all my other 3x more expensive lipsticks did transfer to the mask (hated). Another benefit is while this is long lasting, it doesn't make your lips dry. You can feel it, but it is not bothersome (I'm super picky). Going on, it has a tiny bit of a flavor, so light that I can't even identify it, but it is pleasant, but it immediately fades. I personally don't want flavored lips.  I would bill this a a long-wearing lip color, not a true lip stain. It is a GREAT product for the money. Don't hesitate to give it a go.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 July 2022

prod_name: Peripera Ink Velvet #3 Red Only, 4 g
title: Ok Year Update- MY DENTIST REQUESTED BRAND AND SHADE
review: Quick update – I had a dental procedure done which included nitrous oxide and a lengthy procedure to which my lipstick remained on flaky and perfectly tinted and at the end of the procedure my dentist asked me the brand and the shade of lipstick I had been using as she had not seen anything like it and was very into make up  herself, or so the front desk said when they asked me for the shade. •As far as MOISTURIZING goes, like most long term lip staining products, this one will apply better if you use a balm or clear colored matte type of uncolored lip base, even chapstick under it will outperform most other brands of long last lip color AND especially for the PRICE. I went with the red one in order to ensure this wasn’t like other sheer colored stains I’ve tried that look dark yet when applied are light pink, and my advice is to believe what the color shows you it will be, as you don’t need to overcompensate on this product. Less is more as well. Just a dab of this smeared across lips goes a king way, or can be used as a lip liner for a very formal pout with the crisp lines of Betty Boop. It can be glossy or matte, as I also recommend using a colored or clear gloss or top coat so that it feels like it is set in and your lips feel like they are not dry. Experiment with different lipsticks or wand colors and you will have produced a color that is entirely “you,” as many people have asked what lipstick shade I’m wearing, and I can’t explain that I combined 3 different products to get the look I wore. Three products that were in my purse at that moment. Bottom line...buy it. A multi use product that will last you a year. And if you don’t like it/worth the $8 to find out if not because you can easily regift it, to your sister on her next staycation she gets paid for.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 February 2021

prod_name: Peripera Ink Velvet #3 Red Only, 4 g
title: Peripera please make darker colors lol
review: Purchased the #3 red only tint and its pretty! a little brighter than what i usually wear. I wish they made darker reds/plums - sigh- lol I love that the formula actually appears soft and smooth like velvet. its not oily or patchy or spreads uneven like a watery tint... its has a soft almost airbrushed appearance. Not a totally dry dry liquid matte lip has a mousse consistency which i like, its not so drying, but if you would prefer to matte it down just dab on a napkin it doesnt transfer much after. My only complaint is it doesnt last after eating. i attached photos after application and after eating. If youre looking for something that requires less touch ups i recommend the airy ink velvets instead they last longer or the ink gelato series from peripera :) those are my go to so far. But these are good :)

prod_name: Peripera Ink Velvet #3 Red Only, 4 g
title: New holy grail lipstick!
review: I'm not normally one to write reviews, but I'm so pleased with this product that I felt obligated to! I even came back to grab a few more colors because the pricepoint is great! I'm obsessed with matte lipsticks! What I'm not obsessed with is how most matte lipsticks leave your lips dry, cakey, and flakey! NOT THIS ONE. The texture of this product is phenomenal! So lightweight, barely feels like anything is on my lips when it dries. Substantially more comfortable than typical lipsticks. Instead of intensifying the cracks in my lips, it smoothed right over them. It leaves my lips looking plumped and perfectly matte. A little bit of this product goes a long way so be sure not to apply too much! I found applying a dab in the center of your lips and using your finger to spread and pat around gives the best effect! I like this lipstick even more than my Jeffree Star Liquid lipsticks! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a lightweight matte lipstick.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Excellent Lipstick
review: I’ve been using Mineral Fusion lipstick for years, but have only used the colour Burst until today when I bought Peony. I’d been looking for more of a red lipstick, and was happy to find this one! It’s not true red, but that wasn’t what I was after! I was happy to find it was a nice spiced red with notes of rust and pink, and a cool undertone. Great for fall/winter photos!The lipstick is nicely moisturizing, and lasts a long time. (Tip for any lipstick: apply, blot, apply another coat.)The scent is kind of a soft sweet smell, and for some reason, reminds me of the smell of play dough. Not offensive in my opinion, but if you don’t like it, you don’t like it.Overall, I’m just really pleased with this product. I don’t always get to give a 5 star review! Please note that I edited the photo of my smile in order to make it as close to the real colour as I could.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Mineral Fusion Burst is my go-to color
review: I’m a fair-skinned Asian with dark brown hair, and Mineral Fusion’s Burst color is my favorite color to wear day or night. It’s a natural salmon/warm pink thrat’s just enough color without being too much color. It can be worn without lipliner, and has just enough thick/creamy texture for good coverage. If your lips have a slightly darker shade to them, this color also balances well against that too.I like it in summer as well as winter months. You do have to be careful about ordering this online in hot summer months, because it can arrived softened which makes the lipstick want to fall off the base as soon as you apply it. Try cooling it off first. I’ve also sometimes found Mineral Fusion lipsticks at Whole Foods, although the Burst color is usually not in stock in stores.I really like that it’s fragrance free and paraben free, and the seed oils and cocoa butter make it moisturizing to reapply throughout the day.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 January 2024

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Mineral Fusion Crushed This Colour

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Small amount of product.
review: I have used mineral Fusion products for years, really like that they are a cleaner nontoxic choice. I ordered the color Inspire, very happy with that part, pretty color on my skin tone. I'm blonde, and blue eyed with neutral/medium skin. No lasting coverage to speak of, if you talk or lick your lips, it's gone pretty quickly. I don't mind reapplying when needed, but there is very little product in the tube. I will reorder, just disappointing, they must have chosen to reduce the amount of product instead of raising the price drastically. Same with their eyebrow pencil, it's more like a "big" sample, SO tiny around and pretty short as well.

I wrote company but did not hear back.It's ok though.  from now on I will be buying my cosmetics in person, as I have never been too happy with on line ordering of cosmetics for this reason. I really hope you will be more lucky.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Crush
review: Excellent lip stick. My favorite for a few years.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 January 2024

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Cracked at base and I did nothing to cause it
review: Used the lipstick about four times and it cracked off at the base. No I didn't have it all the way extended or drop it or anything else to abuse the lipstick; it just cracked. It did not moisturize my lips. It was more like paint, sticky before it dries. Obviously the longevity of the product was a bust. In terms of how long it stayed on my lips? The edges stayed long after the rest of the product came off. Was it flattering? Not for me. I'm in my late 60s, so this lipstick not only bled off the edges of my lips but highlighted wrinkles in my lips. Have you ever seen old ladies who look like they missed their lips when putting on lipstick? That's how this product looks on me. Have you ever seen the lips of kids who keep licking their lips and the edges look red and chapped. Me again with this lipstick. I took a picture, but when I cropped it to just show the product, well I thought better of it and decided not to post it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 January 2022

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Crush...beautiful color for my fair/mature skin palette
review: Crush is quite pigmented and bright. I also bought Nude and layer it over Crush. Together they are unbeatable.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Probably flattering for someone else
review: This lipstick has a feel that is somehow dry and oily at the same time, probably due to the mineral powder fighting with the moisturizing ingredients. That doesn't sound good, but it's not actually uncomfortable, stays on, and isn't sticky, although I find I need to blot it. I blot most lipsticks, however.I bought this in Ruby and Peony. I am reviewing Ruby here. I thought it was a pretty pinky-red shade, and it is, but it is a bit dull. It has slightly greyish undertones (I have olive skin). If you subscribe to the four seasons theory of colour, I'm pretty sure it is a summer lipstick, whereas I am a winter. It is quite pretty, but I find it a little dull on me.The one real issue I have with this lipstick is its scent. It's very strong and not all that pleasant. I don't think it smells as if it has gone bad or anything. It is just heavily scented with a sort of chemical smell I don't like. Worse even than L'Oreal.Otherwise, it comes in a pretty metallic tube that feels heavy and "expensive". That's on the plus side of things. Hope this helps.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 May 2022

review: My wife likes the silky moisturizing feel of this product but it is lighter than her natural lip color so she’s not thrilled about that and it doesn’t have staying power, it rubs off much too easily so she has to constantly reapply. review: I liked color very much so I kept. Tastes weird though.  Now wondering  whether the date was old. Do they date it?  I didn’t think to check.  Maybe that is the issue and so this problem may not be universal. Unsure. Waxy, rancidy tasting. I do really like the fact that it is natural though. Kust make sure you get it fresh.

review: I love the shade and feel of this lipstick. I saw it recommended via EWG. I gave it four stars instead of five because the lipstick broke off after several uses. I will likely buy it again as I was able to push it back down and continue using it.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: OMG
review: I found this product after finally deciding to get non toxic makeup. I did not have high expectations but omg this is an amazing product. I bought a similar shade of lip pencil from the same brand. I highly recommend applying the lip liner on your lips first before this. It def helps with making it last longer.I started to get allergic reactions to my previous makeup (with is why i finally decided to switch) and now theyve completely stopped. I don't have to worry about how my skin will look/ feel after I put makeup on.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 April 2023

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Goes on easily, but wears off rather easily.
review: Loved the natural ingredients, but it wears off rather easily.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: I really liked this lipstick at first, but it broke inside the tube and it is unusable.
review: I really liked this lipstick at first, but it broke inside the tube and it is unusable. The color is very nice, but the lipstick should not break.  The packaging is a problem with several Mineral Fusion products.  In this case the lipstick breaks in the tube and in the case of the powder foundation the lid hinge breaks.  This is a shame because the lipstick and the foundation are very good, but in the end you are paying for a cosmetic that cannot be used shortly after opening.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 February 2023

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Clean lipstick and gorgeous colors
review: It was hard picking out colors. I bought Burst and Gem.  Burst is closest to my wrist. They are both in the same color family, which is berry. Love them both. It goes on smoothly and is long lasting with strong pigment. Nice light flavor. There’s a young lady on youtube that shows you all the colors by applying them on her lips. Couldn’t have picked them without her. Hope this helps.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 April 2023

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Not for mature lips!
review: Product was not flattering nor moisturizing, as indicated on my online search for top lipsticks for mature lips. The color did nothing for my, was not "satin" as website description, and didn't stay on long. Will not buy this product again. Good old Maybelline here I come!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 May 2023

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Lipstick that arrived is not sealed
review: I did not like the lipstick as it was not sealed when it arrived in the package, going to return it

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Very hydrating
review: This lipstick makes your lips feel very hydrated. I’m bought the NUDE color and it is a very nice color. The formula isn’t super thick and sort of melts into your lips. The colors to choose from in the pics are terrible and don’t match the actual product. I went to YouTube to find people who bought and actually swatched the product before choosing my color. The smell took me back a bit when I first applied the lipstick and I was disappointed I wouldn’t be able to deal with it, but over time I got used to it and I don’t mind it at all now. The color lasts somewhat if you let the lipstick “dry” or soak into your lips before doing anything that would mess it up. Overall, I love that the ingredients are non-toxic and that it is hydrating. This is the most hydrating lipstick I own. I would love to try some of their other lips products.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 August 2019

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: I really like this pink/ coral color
review: So I love Mineral Fusion lipsticks, despite the conflicting reviews. They have great colors, are moisturizing, wear well during a day, are safe for those with gluten allergies, and worth the expense. I’ve been using their makeup on & off for several years.Im trying to get spring ready and am working on finding the perfect pink/ coral mix. I use to love the color Orgasm by NARS, but am no longer able to use it. INSPIRE is closer to what I am going for. Although I did just order Crush. So I’ll do a comparison once I receive it.The color is very attractive. Works well with my skin tone, which is fair with a yellow undertone. I did a test on my wrist with a comparison of colors. But it’s deceptive. And hard to see what those lipsticks truly look like. They appear very sheer in the image but are actually not.Inspire is a medium pink with a coral/ orange undertone. It would probably look attractive on most skin tones. A good neutral that can be topped with gloss if needed.. Not overly bright. I can see this working well for the transition into spring/ summer.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 January 2020

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Old lipstick
review: Colour is okay. This lipstick has a funny smell on the lips. Seems like it's VERY old stock. Does not go on smoothly. Really seems stale. Most disappointed with this purchase.... and not cheap.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Wife is happy
review: My wife likes this product and is happy with it. Price is good also

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Flashy is not orangey after all
review: I was hoping Flashy would be a bit more orange but it turned out dark red on my lips. Stayed on for a long time even after eating slightly greasy food. Very moisturizing and silky. Very very slight fragrance

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring

review: It is about the quality of the product. It has the smell of plastic and oil. I can not use it. The color is good, in any case.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 November 2023

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Wow, purpley! But pretty and durable.
review: My migraines are triggered by FD&C red dyes, so I primarily bought this lipstick because it's one of the few brands that I can wear safely!  Yay for that! This is a good purchase and I wear it pretty often. The formula for some reason is quite drying, though, and if you don't exfoliate your lips, it will tint the dryer areas more deeply than the rest. It stays on very well and keeps its sparkle. VERY pigmented! Even a light application gives a bold color.On to the color. I have dark brown hair and cool ivory skin (pink undertones), and this is an OK shade on me. VERY purple! Much more purple than it looks in the picture.  It's about as close to purple as you can go while still calling the color 'red' - deep fuschia, perhaps. Something close to Pantone 208 PC. It looks good on me, but I was hoping for something redder. Mineral Fusion's "Mystery" is a good alternative, if you prefer something less purple but still shaded for cool-toned skin.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 December 2014

It is very moisturising and doesn't dry my lips as most lip products do. The colour adapts to the skin so it will look different on each person. Forever Peach looks absolutely lovely, just the right shade for my skin tone. I love it and use it daily. I only wish that there was a bit more product in the tube!

La barra tiene una consistencia suave y unos reflejos brillantes que hacen efecto plumpy tremendo ! y el color , como ya he dicho me encanta ! además es muy duradero .

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Subtle Natural looking Color
review: Forever Pink - My skin is warm, fair-medium and it added a nice flush of color and light glow on my checkbones and brow bone.  Looks natural and is buildable, but you don't need much.  Wait a few minutes before adding more.  It lasted all day and feels light on your skin.  Love it on skin.Lips: If your lips are very dry, you need to exfoliate dry lips first or it will pill on your lips.  It's not drying on lips, but not very moisturizing either.  I like the color on my pale lips as it makes them look darker and still very natural and subtle.  The only downside is it doesn't last long on my lips, but nothing does.  After the morning application, I'd rather reapply a $5 tinted balm in my pocket that I can use all day for more moisture.I'd still reorder it, but only because I think it looks very good on skin.  If your lips aren't on the dry side, it may last a long time and is great for a more natural look.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 January 2024

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip & Cheek Stain
review: This is my 3rd Just Kissed Lip & Cheek Stain and I really like it. So far I've tried pink and red colours and I liked both of them. The colour is quite strong, sth in between lipstick and lip gloss but definitely stronger than lip gloss. Nicely moisturising and very smooth on the lips. I will buy again.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 March 2018

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Not a lip plumper, just lip gloss
review: Most expensive and disappointing lip gloss I’ve ever bought. Was expecting a red lip color that would plump my lips. This does neither. Hardly a blush of color. Lips remain as ever. This is seriously not worth the price.

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Looks great.
review: Looks great on my 68 year old lips. Blurs the lip line so you can “fudge” more plump lips. Does not dry them out. Feels good on lips. Just enough color to make your lips look they are there. Also works really well as a blush. My only complaint is that they don’t have a more rose color to mimic a moreNatural lip color. These are light peach and medium peach.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 March 2024

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink

review: Nehme das Produkt schon seit Jahren. Der Stift ist sehr ergiebig, die Farbe dezent und langanhaltend. Er klebt nicht wie viele Lipgloss und färbt nicht ab. Sehr gut unter einer Maske zu tragen.

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Fine but not brilliant
review: This is a perfectly fine lipbalm, it gives a soft pinky glow and soothes the lips - it’s not worth £20 though - there are balms that work just as well for much less -  £20 is how nearly how much Dior charge for a balm and given the price I was hoping for a replacement of the rich cherry colour you get with the now discontinued IT Cosmetics Lip & Cheek Tint. It also smells like cheap make up. Fine but not work the money.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 March 2021

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Nice to put on
review: Good quality lipstick in that it needs a little effort to wind it up, colour comes up nice and I do not normally wear lipstick as if I usually find it too slimey but this feels great on
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 September 2018

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Der Preis ist unverschämt
review: Ich war sehr neugierig auf diesen Lipplumper, da die Marke Jane Iredale im Internet sehr gut bewertet wird und ich eine Möglichkeit gesucht habe den Lippen eine möglichst zarte, natürliche aber doch intensivere Farbe zu verleihen. Außerdem hat mich fasziniert, dass je nach ph-Wert der Haut das Ergebnis unterschiedlich ausfallen kann, gegen ein bisschen Aufpolsterung hätte ich auch nichts :-).Als der Stift nach einigen Tagen ankam war ich erst mal ernüchtert, es ist eher ein Lippenstiftchen (ca. 0,9cm Durchmesser und 2,5cm lang ist die Lippenstiftsäule, also das eigentliche Material). Aber die Neugierde hat mich davon abgehalten den Stift sofort zurück zu schicken.Nach dem Auftragen merkt man ein wenig Prickeln aber nicht unangenehm, das ein Weilchen anhält. Die Färbung hat sich nach ca.2 min ausgebildet, nicht ganz was ich wollte aber doch nahe daran. Zur Veranschaulichung habe ich 2 Bilder hochgeladen (davor und ca.10 min danach). Man sieht ganz gut die Farbveränderung und das sich die Lippen leicht (wirklich nur sehr zart) aufpolstern. Sehr positiv finde ich, dass das Ergebnis sehr lange anhält und die Lippen natürlich schimmern, wenn man nicht gerade Spaghetti isst auch noch nach dem Essen. Geschmacklich ist der Stift neutral.Fazit: Den Preis finde ich unverschämt (deshalb einen Stern Abzug, dabei ist er hier über amazon noch deutlich günstiger als bei anderen Anbietern), das Ergebnis aber gut und die Haltbarkeit nach dem Auftragen deutlich besser als alles was mir bisher begegnet ist.update: 16.4.2015 Ich benutze den Lippenstift fast jeden Tag, mehr als 2-3 mal pro Tag ist nicht nötig, um eine anhaltende Tönung zu erreichen. Ich habe ihn im letzten August gekauft und nun ist er erst ca. zur Hälfte aufgebraucht. Definitiv ein Nachkaufprodukt!

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Great lip color and moisturizing
review: I have seen these lipsticks for sometime. For $32. I definitely hesitated, but decided to try it as it popped up as an item to look at and maybe try.I am very happy with the red color. It goes on so smoothly and is very moisturizing and the color or hint of color does stay on for quite some time, although not all day.I gave this lipstick a four star because for $32 I think the prices pretty high for lipstick.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 March 2024

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: 一点だけ残念なところが。
review: お安かったし、すぐ届いたし、ほぼOKだったのですが、ひとつだけ難点が。国内販売用の日本語商品名や成分表示のステッカーが、本体下半分全体を覆うように貼ってあり、見た目が良くないので剥がそうとしたらキレイに剥がせなくてベタベタが残ってしまい，不快です。なんとかならないでしょうか。

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink

I use it mostly as a lip tint and while I love that it provides a natural looking tint, it dries my lips out terribly and I'm constantly applying lip balm before and after. As a lip tint it stays on between 1-2 hours.

As if by magic it colours the lips and cheeks as it looks pretty colourless ,but don't be put of it gives a lovely colour to lips and cheeks it's one of my fav products and it feels nice on too ,but don't expect a deep colour as it is subtle on but if you want a natural look this is the one ! Day time it's fabulous.....

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: 手離せないアイテム
review: 以前百貨店で購入して使用してから手離せないアイテムになっています。肌のPhに反応して発色するそうで、唇の状態によって発色の程度が多少かわります。薄づきのオレンジから発色の良いオレンジといった感じですが、どれも肌になじみお化粧をあまりしていなくてもこれさえつけていれば肌のトーンも明るく見える気がしています。無味無臭で潤いも与えてくれます。口紅を試す→唇が荒れるの繰り返しだったので本当に重宝しています。内容成分の着色成分は日本の薬事法か何かの関係で赤色xx号という表記になるそうですが、天然成分を使っているとお店の方は話していました。

review: I really wanted to love this product. I’ve used many water lip stains in the past that have made them now my “go to”. It’s Fuchsia and closer to hot pink than cherry. I feel like I stepped back in time and not in a good way. Not only is the color awful, but it bleeds around the mouth. Nobody likes that…..nobody. Needless to say,  I won’t be purchasing this again.

title: NA
review: Il est incroyable ! Il est crémeux et hydratant ( super pour les lèvres sèches ) il a un fini mat, mais pas sec  vous pouvez ajouter un gloss par dessus pour un fini brillant, c’est canon aussi. Il tient pas mal. Le rapport qualité / prix est vraiment génial comparé à d’autres marques qui vendent à des prix exorbitants sans que le résultat soit « wouahe »J’ai acheté le 602 Nude admirable et j’aime beaucoup la couleur discrète, mais voyante. Ça fait de belles lèvres ! Le 482 le mauve indomptable incroyable également. Il est un peu plus prononcé, mais il fait son effet. Bref j’aime tropLiké svp 🤗❤️

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Oltre le mie aspettativr
review: Bellissimo! L'involucro è molto bello, soft touch, ed è anche abbastanza "pesante" : dà una sensazione di prodotto luxury, e ciò dà una certa soddisfazione. Presenta un ottimo profumo, non troppo forte. Il colore è stupendo: un rosso con una punta di fucsia; se siete per l'armocromia dovrebbe andare bene per le persone inverno.  Per essere matte, non è secchissimo, e questo mi piace molto. Veramente un gran bel prodotto e con un prezzo conveniente. Arriva sigillato con uno sticker in modo tale da assicurare che non sia stato aperto. Lo consiglio.

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Sehr schönes Lippenstift
review: Farbe wie angegeben

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Il matte perfetto
review: Il rossetto si presenta in un package davvero molto elegante per forma e per colori.Ho scelto il colore 603 "Le Wood Nonchalant" davvero un bel colore e l'effetto sulle labbra è strepitoso. Il rossetto nonostante sia un matte non risulta secco, anzi idrata molto le labbra e sembra quasi di mettere un burrocacao. Si riesce ad essere molto precisi nell'applicarlo.Ha una buona tenuta, è riuscito a resistere alla fastidiosa condensa sotto una ffp2 e ha resistito egregiamente per ore dopo aver sorriso, parlato e bevuto.La cosa che più mi ha sorpresa è l'effetto matte, è super opaco, ma anche idratante e morbido, caratteristiche che difficilmente si trovano contemporaneamente in un rossetto.Piacevole la leggera nota floreale, invece l'effetto volumizzante sinceramente io non l'ho sperimentato, probabilmente è legato al colore che ho scelto.Nel complesso è un ottimo prodotto, lo consiglio a tutte.

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Jolie teinte, facile à appliquer.
review: Acheté 9.32 euros.La couleur est comme indiquée aucune surprise, ne donne pas l'impression d'avoir les lèvres toute sèches après application.Jolie teinte satisfaite du résultat : tout dans la discrétion.

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: a luxurious feel, striking the perfect balance between intense color and a moisturized pout
review: In summary, L'Oréal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume Matte Lipstick combines intense colour, lasting power, and a moisturizing touch—a top-tier choice for matte lipstick enthusiasts.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 December 2023

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume

review: Der Lippenstift ist matt und dadurch lange haltbar und die Farbe ist einzigartig!

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume

review: Me encantaaaaaaa, el color es bellísimo y es espectacular. Buena compra, lo recomiendo

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Color bonito y duradero
review: El color es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Dura en promedio de 6 a 9 hrs sin retoque, y no reseca los labios. Ya es el segundo que compro puesto que gustó más de lo esperado!

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Angenehme, deckende Farbe
review: Trotz, dass es eine sehr angenehme und deckende Farbe ist, verwischt der Lippenstift eher schnell.Dafür spürt man ihn überhaupt nicht auf den Lippen. Wirklich toll!

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Muy bonita fórmula y colores
review: Estoy disfrutando mucho estos labiales. Son muy cremosos y los siento muy cómodos en los labios. Sí transfieren pero no me molesta. No soy muy fan de los labiales indelebles así que prefiero estos. El empaque es hermoso y el hecho de que sean delgados hace que sean muy fáciles de aplicar. Yo lo llevo en la bolsa siempre para reaplicarlo después de comer. Tienen un perfume como floral que me agradó bastante. Los colores son hermosos y vienen súper pigmentados.

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Davvero matte ed idratante al tempo stesso
review: Premesso che io adoro il finish matte (stile retromatte di Mac e rossetti prima versione di Mulac), patendo anche la secchezza che si percepisce sulle labbra, con questo rossetto della L'oreal ho finito di soffrire: il colore è pieno dalla prima passata e non si sente sulle labbra. Risulta idratante e duraturo allo stesso tempo. Anche se ho il contorno labbra irregolarr riesco ametterlo al volo anche senza matita grazie alla forma in stilo del prodotto. Vogliamo poi parlare del packaging: davvero raffinato stile Anni 20 e con un soft touch davvero gradevole. Odore magnifico: non il solito odore di violetta o talco che odio!!

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Sans plus
review: Aucun effet repulpant. L'effet sur les lèvres est sympa mais pas dingue pour les retours qu'il peut avoir. Le raisin est fin. Il s'applique très facilement et tient assez bien de par sa texture matte mais confortable. Cependant je ne vais pas l'acheter à nouveau et en tester d'autre.

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume

review: Sehr schöner Lippenstift, kam früher und gut verpackt an.

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: No dura 24 horas, pero es bonito
review: Es de una textura suave, tiene un olor como a rosas, no es indeleble y tampoco dura las 24 horas. Se corre con muuucha facilidad. El tono es precioso, mate y un poco hidratante.

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: 16 Stunden Halt - halte ich für einGerücht
review: Die Farbe ist schön und kräftig. Beim Auftragen hat man den Eindruck der Lippenstift schmilzt und verteilt sich so auf den Lippen, soweit also erstmal alles super. Aber der Halt ist leider weit entfernt von 16 Stunden. Für mich ist das ein normaler Lippenstift ohne besonderen Hinweis auf den Halt. Als Vieltrinker hat er bei mir nicht mal 3 Stunden überlebt. Positiv ist jedoch, dass die Tassen nach dem Spülen in der Maschine alle wieder makellos sauber wurden. Er wird also auch hier gut "abgeschmolzen" und entfernt.

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Beau rose poudré
review: Très satisfaite de cette couleur j'ai hésité longuement avec le Kiko longue tenue. La couleur est rose poudré , ne tire ni sur le mauve ni sur le fushia. Je suis brune au teint clair très bel effet. Facile à appliquer . Longue tenue mais pas 24 h non plus. Effet mat que j'aime beaucoup . Je vais acheter la même gamme en rose mauve. J'espère vous aider dans votre choix car acheter du maquillage en ligne ce n'est pas évident. Envoyé dans son emballage d'origine et scellé.👍

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Buen producto

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Rossetto matte ma davvero idratante!
review: La prima cosa da dire su questo rossetto è che il pack è davvero bello e di qualità, uno stick vellutato e sottile di colore nero e oro contiene la tinta, la chiusura è salda e non c'è il rischio che possa aprirsi da solo se messo in borsa o in un beautycase..Il rossetto ha un'ottima profumazione, il colore è molto pigmentato e vibrante, una volta applicato rende le labbra matte ma al contempo non tira e non fa antiestetiche pieghette, è molto nutriente e confortevole. Sembra quasi di applicare un burro cacao o un balsamo labbra, infatti è molto scorrevole e non secca..Il colore 188 "Le Rose Activist" è un bel rosa intenso e carico, vira leggermente sul fucsia ma senza la componente eccessivamente accesa.. Perfetto per la stagione estiva!

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Consigliatissimo
review: Non mi piacciono i rossetti lucidi preferisco di gran lunga quelli matte come questi anche se tendono a seccare le labbra più facilmente.  L’Oréal Paris Rossetto Color Riche Intense Volume Matte invece dona un bellissimo colore matte e non secca per niente le labbra donandole un piacevole effetto volumizzante. E' molto morbido e si stende benissimo, la durata è ottima e non vi ritroverete il prodotto solo nelle pieghette dopo poche ora. Il packaging è molo elegante e raffinato, perfetto da mettere nelle pochette. Io ho preso la tonalità 482 Mauve Indompta perché mi piacciono i nude rosati ma penso che acquisterò anche qualche altro colore più acceso perché sono rimasta davvero stupita da questo rossetto.

prod_name: L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Intense Volume
title: Es un labial mate pero el color en labios me decepcionó
review: Cuando abres este tono de labial se ve hermoso, pero cuando lo puse en mis labios era como si hubiera comido donitas bimbo con color rosa pastel, o como si estuviera aplicando maquillaje infantil; no me gustó en absoluto, incluso la sensación... esperaba que fuera diferente. Probaré con otro tono más intenso.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: lovely everyday colour- Cannes
review: Purchased this to try as my Matt lipsticks were becoming heat damaged when I left them in my car. This solves my problem. The small sponge applicator allows for easy application. Colour and texture is lovely. Lasted most of the day. Great price and super fast delivery. Highly recommend.

review: So comfortable! Creamy! Lasting! And for such a great price ❤️😍🔥

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: Super
review: There is very little product in the tube and it looks like I will only get about 5 uses out of it. Barely any product comes out onto applicator and when dipping the applicator it feels empty inside. Actual product of what I could scrounge up is nice though. Would like a refund pls.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: Sec
review: Have been waiting for almost 6 months for this shade to become available. While London/ Stockholm are nudes/neutrals for lighter skin tones, this is more pigmented and is a neutral shade for medium-deeper skin tones. I even tried out a Miss Claire dupe but nothing like the original NYX Cannes. The colour lasts and I just love it. It may look more pinkish/brownish depending on one's skin tone but it's just a fabulous colour- neither too bold nor too light.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: So soft and a great matted lip
review: This is buttery smooth and easy to use. I love the color!!  I am Mexican-American with dark features, and I believe this is a great shade of pink for my complexion. It gives me an ego-boost when I wear it!Need to know: It scented—maybe cotton candy?  It’s subtle, and I don’t mind it.As for having to use lip liner or whatever prepping some makeup aficionados might to when wearing lipstick, I did t do any of that. I do notice that after a while of eating/drinking and using napkins, it wears off and I’m left with lined-lips, but that’s my experience with most lipsticks.I definitely recommend this if your looking for a pop of color to wear.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 December 2022

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: 発色がすごく良い！
review: 発色が凄く良いです！ソフトマットリップなので、がっつりマットにならず、乾燥しないので良いと思います。いつもマットなものを使っているのですが、これもアリかなと思います。マットリップに比べると、塗り直しの回数が増えるのがちょっと面倒かなーと思いますがまあ、発色、テクスチャーは凄く良いので★５です。笑

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: Beautiful but be careful with the colours, they aren't the same as the photos!
review: After ordering my first nyx soft matte lip cream a few weeks back and falling in love I decided to buy another shade and yet again have fallen in love.The creams are so so soft and comfortable on the lips, the pigmentation is crazy good and the lasting power is pretty good for saying they aren't a liquid lipstick. If you are after a nice matte lip without the uncomfortable drying feeling then these are diffinately a good shout.The only thing I would highly recommend about these is that you go and watch swatch videos on YouTube as the colours don't look the same as they do on the photos on here so i think it's best to go watch someone putting them on before you pick one!Beautiful, still in love and will be raving about these for the rest of my life!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 June 2016

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: It is SOOOOO good
review: I am really satisfied with this productI got the SMLC04 London, and trust me i have never been more satisfied with any of other well-known brands. It actually gives you a powdery matte effect, it is smudge proof, water proof, kiss proof(not faking it),starbucks proof(yes if u sip your coffee, gals chillax its gonna stay) and it atleast stays for 5hrs. I said 5hrs because i had to clean it after that and i had keep rubbing moisturiser to take it off. I AM VERY SURE I GOT THE ORIGINAL PRODUCT. But do be careful.I am not saying it better than kylie jenner lip kit but its comparatively way BETTER than most of the well known brands. Oh and after you apply it nicely it takes a minute or less to actually settle down.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: Quite pink but not too bright
review: This is the second lip cream I purchased as I find they are really good value for money. The color is quite pink and very pigmented so you can build it up to quite a bright color if you wanted to or just wear less and have a more subtle shade. Once you wait for it to dry they last a long time and arent too drying as long as you put on lip balm first. The colors are really different on so many people so its really hard to tell what it will look like.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: 発色の良い大人カラー
review: マットでリップにありがちなヌルヌルした触感が全然ありません。時間が経っても乾かず潤っています。感覚的にリップの脂を乗せる浮いた感じではありません。唇につけるファンデーションの様です。肌に馴染むカラーなので全く透明感はありませんが自然な色合いに。香りはバニラベースの甘い香りで唇は荒れません。ティッシュで落ち着かせると意外と色落ちするのでタップリと付けるより少量を馴染ませる方が良いです。追記艶なしにありがちなカサカサになりにくい使用感なのに見た目通りの発色でグラスに紅が残らないので外食時に便利です。甘い香りが 強すぎるので食事の時には味が変わってしまいます。好きな香りですが 少し抑えめだと良かったです。

prod_name: Revlon Ultra HD Matte Lipcolor, HD Kisses
title: Buy your Revelon liquid lippies from Amazon because
review: I barely review lipsticks but this one stole my heart for two reasons:1. Amazon does a great job when It comes to selling these lippies well packaged. I used to get mine at my local drugstore. Almost every tube seemed opened and swatched. I would end up leaving the store empty handed as I’m aware of the long list of diseases associated with sharing lipsticks (mono, common cold, Hepatitis B and herpes are just a few). I am not a germophobe in any sense; but I have became more sensative to my makeup hygiene after watching the Markerplace episode on cosmetics.I ordered the shade Forever from Amazon. My tube came packaged in a plastic wrap. Sealed. New. Fresh, un swatched liquid lipstick. I’ve posted a photo of it so you get the idea. It was so satisfying to open the package.2. The formula is great. It’s one of the most comfortable matte liquid lippie I have ever tried. I also love that the applicator is fairly flat so not too much product comes out of the tube when you take the applicator out. This which makes it very precise line. It dries on the lips quickly, leaving a comfortable matte finish. Has a sweet scent, but no one that’s overpowering.The shade Forever (a muddy pink nude) is pretty much my own lips shade, but better. If you are looking for an everyday nude (with pink/brown undertone) that wouldn’t smudge on you, nor would it hurt your wallet, I’d suggest giving this shade a try. It’s very close to NYX’s Soft Matte lippie in shade Stockholm, but with a better staying power.I hope this was helpful to all my makeup lovers out there :)

prod_name: Revlon Ultra HD Matte Lipcolor, HD Kisses
title: Natürlich, cremig, Revlon
review: Vor dem Kauf kannte ich die Revlon Ultra HD Matte Lipcolor Serie bereits. Bisher war meine Lieblingsfarbe "Embrace", aber auch "Kisses" und "Devotion" nutze ich ab und an. Jetzt habe ich "Seduction" für mich entdeckt - mein neuer Favorit! Die Farbe ist noch dezenter als "Embrace" und damit prima für den Alltag geeignet.Wer einen super deckenden und kussechten Lippenstift erwartet, wird aber enttäuscht werden. Salopp gesagt ist es (meiner Meinung nach) eher sowas wie eine pigmentierte Lippenpflege 😁 Dadurch trocknen die Lippen nicht aus, aber die Farbe muss öfter nachgezogen werden. Ich persönlich bin damit total zufrieden.Die Konsistenz ist cremig, der Geruch gewohnt angenehm - Revlon halt. 😊

prod_name: Bath & Body Works C.O. Bigelow 3 Pack Mentha Shimmer
title: Just what I was looking for!
review: I love this lip gloss.  It's just what I was searching for (a light weight gloss with a mauve tint that is subtle/natural looking and not too dark).  The price was good too considering I was paying $28 for one tube of Estee Lauder Pure Envy Lip Gloss which was the same color.  It was discontinued which is why I searched for something comparable on Amazon.  Sometimes I find that gloss with frost can be gritty which is a deal breaker.  This gloss did not have a gritty feel.  It does have a strong spearmint scent and taste which could be an issue for some buyers but I adjusted to it after a couple of days.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 February 2020

prod_name: Manhattan Intensive Shimmer Finish Colour
title: Setzt belebende Akzente auf den Lippenstift
review: Ich trage gern Lippenstift. Aber selbst bei teuren Marken bin ich oft mit dem Ergebnis nicht so ganz zufrieden. Besonders Nude Töne, so schön sie auch sind, wirken auf meinen Lippen oft unscheinbar, blass und zu eintönig. Da muss ich dann nachhelfen und der zu unauffälligen oder matten Lippenfarbe etwas mehr Leben einhauchen. Das geschieht am besten mit einem Lipgloss, der ein Highlight auf die Lippen setzt und sie interessanter erscheinen lässt. Den Trick hab ich von einer Maskenbildnerin übernommen samt einem Döschen Highlighter in hellem Lilarosa mit silbrigem Schimmer. Den Highlighter hab ich mit einem Lippenpinsel aufgetragen. Doch irgendwann war das Döschen leer. Ich wollte mir ein ähnliches Produkt beschaffen. Meine Wahl fiel auf den Manhattan Lipgloss Highshine in einem zarten Violettrosa. Dieser Farbton passt erfahrungsgemäß gut zu meiner hellen Haut. Der Highlighter enthält winzige silbrige Partikel, die aber so dezent aussehen, dass sie durchaus alltagstauglich sind.Der Gloss duftet angenehm süß wie ein Bonbon. Er belebt wie erwünscht jeden Lippenstift, lässt ihn weicher und seidiger aussehen.Die transparente altrosa Nuance passt auf fast alle meine Lippenstifte, außer Orangetöne bzw. Coral- oder Terrakotta-Farben.Ich hab mit getöntem Gloss bessere Erfahrungen gemacht als mit farblosem, der oft hart und nicht so sanft schimmernd wirkt.Der Manhattan Highshine verschönert alle Lippenstifte, zu denen er farblich passt. Die Farbe wird leuchtender, heller und hält länger. Ich hab das Gefühl, dass meine Lippen nicht so schnell austrocknen, obwohl ich natürlich hydrierenden Lippenstift verwende.Der Gloss lässt sich mit dem kleinen Schwämmchen leicht auftragen. Die Konsistenz der Creme ist gerade richtig, nicht zu dick und nicht zu dünn.Gut finde ich, dass der Gloss lange Zeit sein frisches, strahlendes Aussehen behält und nicht eintrocknet. Man muss also nicht ständig nachschminken.Ich kann den preisgünstigen sowie ergiebigen Highgloss bestens empfehlen.Ich trage ihn allerdings immer nur auf Lippenstift, nie alleine.

My favorite way to wear this is to first use a lip pencil to outline before coloring in with this beautiful shade and brand of lipstick.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss, Angel Food Cake
title: NA
review: I have very, very pale, Winter-toned skin. Matching lip shades to my complexion can be tough when I want a colour to be deep enough to be dramatic (I'm a goth), while also echoing my natural lip-tone to "light" the rest of my features. Well, we have a winner.Devils Food Cake is the perfect shade for Snow Whites who want to put a bit of blood into their lips, & it applies just wonderfully - the point of the doe-foot applicator allows for precision application, while still picking up plenty of pigment on each dip. It doesn't smudge easily, with a liner, & it feels comfortable; it's never sticky but somehow also never slimy - more like a glaze than a gloss! It feels conditioning, but not greasy, & I *love* that it's unscented & unflavoured.I don't know how long it'll last on my lips; it *is* only a gloss, after all, & it'd just be unfair to expect it to behave like anything else. But I can say that while it lasts, the colour wears true. And this hue is just *so* flattering for a blue/pink-toned complexion.An absolute steal at twice the price.
