prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss, Angel Food Cake
title: Luscious Lips with Comfortable Wear
review: I’ve been using NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss in the Angel Food Cake shade, and it’s quickly become one of my favorites. The true mauve color is beautiful and versatile, suitable for a range of skin tones and occasions.The texture is what stands out the most. Unlike many lip glosses that can feel sticky or heavy, this butter gloss lives up to its name with a smooth, buttery application. It feels comfortable on the lips, and I can wear it for hours without any discomfort.The gloss provides a lovely shine without being overly glossy, striking the perfect balance for those who want a noticeable yet understated look.It’s easy to apply, with a wand that allows for precise and even application. The size of the gloss is also convenient for carrying in a purse or a makeup bag.The gloss is fairly long-lasting for a non-sticky formula, though it does require reapplication after eating or drinking.The reason for giving it four stars is the need for frequent reapplication to maintain the color intensity.Overall, the NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss in Angel Food Cake is a fantastic product for anyone looking for a non-sticky, comfortable, and beautifully colored lip gloss. It’s a great addition to any makeup collection for everyday wear or special occasions.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss, Angel Food Cake

Das Geruchsempfinden ist so, als ob man ein echtes Tiramisu auf den Lippen hat.Meine Tochter kann diesen nur wärmstens weiterempfehlen. Ihre Sammlung wird definitiv durch diese Lipglosssticks von NYX erweitert! :)

prod_name: Revlon Super Lustrous Glass Shine Lipstick,
title: Shine the lovechild of lipstick and gloss.
review: Revlon the lipstick of yesterday and apparently today. This is my third one. I bought the peach one this time. The colours are as they appear, in a nice glistening format. It's not sticky at all and doesn't feather or bleed. That being said a little  lip liner wouldn't go amiss. Revlon shine does just that and it's moisturizing, no more dry wrinkly crinkly looking lips. You will have to reapply as its staying power is less than traditional lipsticks, but it is so worth it. They do get a little soft in really hot weather but that's not a deal breaker for me. Try one I don't think you will be disappointed.

prod_name: Revlon Super Lustrous Glass Shine Lipstick,
title: Balsamo-roseto per labbra: favoloso, bellissimo colore e piacevole sulla pelle
review:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    
Ho recentemente provato il balsamo-roseto per labbra e devo dire che sono rimasto davvero colpito dalla sua qualità. È semplicemente favoloso! Non solo il colore è bellissimo, ma è anche molto piacevole da applicare sulle labbra.Una delle cose che apprezzo di più di questo balsamo-roseto è il suo bellissimo colore. La tonalità è perfetta per donare alle labbra un aspetto naturale e sano. Non è eccessivamente pigmentato, ma offre comunque un tocco di colore delicato che migliora l'aspetto complessivo delle labbra.La texture di questo balsamo-roseto è davvero piacevole. È morbido e cremoso, scivola senza sforzo sulle labbra e le idrata delicatamente. Non ho avuto problemi di secchezza o screpolature dopo averlo applicato, il che lo rende perfetto per l'uso quotidiano. Inoltre, non è appiccicoso e non si accumula nelle pieghe delle labbra.Sono così entusiasta di questo balsamo-roseto che ho già ordinato altri tre. Mi piace averne uno a portata di mano ovunque vada, sia nella borsa che nel cassetto del trucco. È diventato un prodotto indispensabile nella mia routine di bellezza quotidiana.In conclusione, consiglio vivamente il balsamo-roseto per labbra a chiunque cerchi un prodotto di qualità con un bel colore e una texture piacevole. È favoloso, dona alle labbra un aspetto naturale e le idrata efficacemente. Sono così soddisfatto che ho deciso di ordinare altri tre. Non vedo l'ora di continuare a utilizzarlo e godere dei suoi numerosi vantaggi per le mie labbra.

prod_name: Revlon Super Lustrous Glass Shine Lipstick,
title: EVERYONE said "Girl, that is YOUR lipstick!"
review: Yep. I bought this lipstick in three shades when it first became available in stores and hoped to never look back. After I changed my copper red hair to a cool mahogany, though, #009 (Toasting Glasses, a dusty rose shade with soft brown undertones to keep the color natural) became the ONLY shade that PERFECTLY complimented my new hair color, pale skin, and green eyes. You know, when you find your perfect jeans, your perfect supportive-but-cute t-shirt bra, and the perfect lipstick how you pray you'll never have to look ever again? That's what this lipstick did for me. Whenever I was in a store that carried it I would always visit the cosmetics aisle and buy up whatever was there. I rarely found more than two tubes, usually finding my shade (and several others) perenially out of stock. The fact that stores often seemed to be "out" set off alarm bells (been through this rodeo more times than I could ever count...) but I always had a few nearly used-up backup tubes to get me through till I could buy up more. Thanks to the caprices of cosmetics manufacturers, I knew my search for the next "okay" substitute was up the road... again. I'm just so tired of having to go through this ALL THE TIME. Back in the day, great shades of lipsticks stuck around for twenty or thirty years (Revlon's Cherries in the Snow may not be for me but it's been around forever because it's a lot of other women's "perfect"). Now, every season, cosmetics companies start over, like with fashion, only, cosmetic colors/formulas that work perfectly with a person's skin tone, hair color, eye color, etc. are RARE and don't really ever need changed-out. It's what makes the beauty industry separate from the whims of the apparel industry. When I swung by the cosmetics aisle in a nearby store last week, sadly, a woman stocking the Revlon products was forced to witness my meltdown as I saw my shade was gone. SHE was the one who noticed the entire line of soft-shine buildable lipsticks had been replaced with different colors (and, as I was to quickly learn, a vastly different formula) in an ever-so-slightly different tube. I knew I was making a mistake but I bought two, only to find my soft-shine formula had been replaced with yet another hideous practically-matte formula😡🤬. Neither tube made it into my house. Tried them in the car where both were promptly tossed in the trash. Nope. I HATE matte and it's ugly stepsister, CREAMY🙄/MATTE. I HATE that feeling of defeat, of being forced to waste vast amounts of precious time and money trying to find yet another perfect go-to lipstick, only to wind up with another thirty or forty failed experiments. The stock-woman suggested Amazon and I DID find MY lipstick here. But I know how this story ends. I need to make time (again) to look for a lipstick I'll love as much as this one because what's being sold here is only what's left over, since Revlon has probably ceased production.At any rate, I truly love this lipstick beyond words. This formula is perfect for people who DESPISE both the bone-dry matte/matt-ish lipsticks cosmetics companies WILL NOT STOP PUSHING, or the high-shine, over-the-top, gloppy glosses that scream 1979. The soft shine of THIS formula is just perfect - and the buildable soft-to-intense color (I like the middle ground) is great for those who prefer anything from subtle lip-balm color to a Va-Va-Va-VOOM pout. Finally, I want to say something about the the type of people who seek out this type of lipstick. We LOVE pretty shine and when it comes to these types of formulas we know the pros (see above) and we accept the cons. WE KNOW we will need to apply this lipstick often but we are fine with that because we LOVE the silky texture, the way it looks, and the way it makes us feel. We accept that pressing the lipstick to our lips all the time means that the less of it that's left equals a bit more of a mess. We KNOW that's going to happen but because we love it, we buy it. In a perfect world we could have perfect lipstick to the end. However, we know the looser formulas will never stay solid-till-the-end the way drier formulas can. But skim through the reviews and you'll see that those of us who love a soft shine ACCEPT the cons WITH the pros. If you'll get irritated by a little mess 3/4 of the way into the tube, no shiny lipstick will make you happy. I hope Revlon undrstands that people who love a shiny, buildable lipstick get it. I mean, look at the pictures with some of these reviews. Every shade is (was?) PERFECT for SOMEBODY. If Revlon would continue to sell this product online, some of us would never stop coming back for more. if they never caved to the haters I think a lot of us would have worn our perfect shades to our graves.Meanwhile, my heart is breaking... again because nothing gold can stay 😪
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 May 2022

The particular shade that I got was Rum Raisin and LOVE IT!

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Cherrywood
review: First time trying these products. I love the burgundy cherrywood color so much. Very nineties. Reminds me of blackberry by Revlon, but now I avoid all of the toxic chemicals. These are a bit cleaner. I would call it more of a moisturizing lipstick than a tinted balm. There is great color payoff. While the color is buildable, if you are looking for a lightly tinted balm, I would skip this, as they might be too intense for you. The color fades slightly after application, presumably from the balm absorbing, but still lasts several hours if you leave it alone. Cherrywood does leave a slight stain, which I also like. I can apply gloss and still look like I have some color to my lips. This is important to me as my lip color is slightly fading with age.Applicator: some reviewers said the applicator is messy, but it’s user error…only if you smear the product all over inside the cap will it then transfer to the outside of the tube. The lid CLICKS when closed, which is brilliant because it stays closed in my purse, so these are awesome for travel. I like that I can retract the product after applying, as some brands only go out further and, if you accidentally extend it too far, you’re in danger of it smushing it in the lid. This was a well thought out feature with this brand.Flavor/scent: there is almost none. I prefer this, because it keeps me from licking my lips once I apply. One reviewer said this shade tastes like cherry; It does not at all. A few other reviewers said it tasted like old lipstick. I can only assume that they got a bad batch, and they should process a return to get a replacement.Upon liking this color so much, I also ordered Cinnamon Raisin, which is a warm-neutral mauve. I’m going to order a few other colors. I wish they made a bright poppy, orange red, since I see they are adding new colors all the time, maybe that’s coming down the pipeline.Hope this review helps!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 February 2024

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Red
review: Love the colour
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 March 2024

So I searched for color that is good for thin lips and I ordered this.  I love it. prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Great color, and texture.
review: I love this color it’s a beautiful dark wine shade. I’ve been searching for one for forever, that still works with my super pale skin and dark hair without washing me out. Like others have said it’s build-able and hydrating. I found it to have a nice stain to it to, maybe because I chose a dark color. But, even though it requires multiple applications a day to retain the same color there is some color left over after eating/drinking which I liked. The texture is amazingly dewy and smooth, and leaves my lips hydrated. Due to its texture, and light staining I prefer it over my traditional lipsticks in the same colors. My one qualm is the applicator gets a bit dirty on the sides of the plastic tube. Some of the color gets on the cap and rubs the side of the plastic tube, but I just wipe it off after a few uses and it’s good as new. Due to the price and quality of the product I still count this as a win, and will purchase more shades and colors.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 January 2024

I didn't notice a scent either.It is very nicely moisturizing, doesn't get all slippery but feel very good.I am writing this review because I was thrilled to receive promptly this delicious looking lip balm.It goes on smoothly, stays on smoothly, doesn't smear and the color is quite nice.  I was so pleasedto find a balm I like so much for this price.  There are other colors I am tempted to buy, maybe mauve, but the Cherrywood is perfect for this older woman.

As a woman of a certain age I find dark lipsticks no longer suit me. Lip colors lighter than my lips look awful. I'm always searching for the perfect medium pink with cool tones. This is close.This is very moisturizing and glides on smoothly. It offers smooth, even coverage. I find this more flattering on me when applied lightly and topped with a light dab of Covergirl Clean Fresh Yummy Gloss in My Strawbooty.I like that this is made with natural products. What I didn't like was the manufacturer packaging. It came in a box without seals and the product itself had no tamper evident seal. It was in an unsealed box and the cap just pulled off. I will likely not buy this again.

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Great concept
review: Good price, above the drugstore chapped lip selections but not enough product for the amount of reapplications.  I have a unique opportunity being on bed rest.  I made sure it was the only product used for 24 hours (well after purchase and intermittent usage), and unfortunately there wasn’t visible signs of improvement nor was any indication of improvement.  I gave 4 stars because the product is quite nice and I am on an outrageous amount of diuretics for over a year and naturally the medication causing dehydration will not yield to a cosmetic application of moisture.  I have to be fair and hopefully inspire others to write a sincere review that assists other shoppers.  Thank you Amazon.

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Hidden gem!
review: This is now become my everyday staple. I purchased the color Canyon Rose. I am Japanese Korean and Irish my skin is neutral Fair. This is really flattering and I get so many compliments. It is a girly pink that goes with almost everything it's not that weird nude that turns yellow. It's all so not too blue of a pink that it looks weird. It makes my lips look more youthful and just pretty. The plus benefit is it is a balm my lips feel smooth but not greasy. Unlike other lip balms the color doesn't dissipate in a few minutes it stays pretty well. This is going to be my go-to lip product. The price of this surprised me for the quality. Please please do not discontinue this
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 October 2023

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Beautiful Color, Well Worth Every $$
review: I purchased "Julep Beauty It's Balm" in Canyon Rose 🌹 when looking for a lip stick. This was a happy surprise. This "lip stick" is a moisturizing lip color that delivers a natural gloss finish. The color appeared to be the perfect a Rose red onscreen. When I received my lipstick it appeared rather "purple-ish" but still within my "color pallet". When I applied the Canyon Rose, the color was absolutely 💯 % perfect for me.!!  The lipstick glides on leaving lips feeling soft, drenched with color & glossy. This could raise a "potential issue" for some people.  CANYON ROSE has a natural, glossy finish.. This is a non-issue for me, however if you don't care for a glossy finish, choose carefully while looking at the JULEP BEAUTY Lip Colors. There are many colors and finishes to choose from.  I will be purchasing several additional items from Julep Beauty. I highly recommend these products. This lipstick is glorious ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 July 2023

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Easy to apply, vibrant, lasting color
review: On first application, I was amazed. Despite the deep color, it was very easy to apply. Goes on smoothly, and easy to adjust with just a tissue. Wore through a long dinner, and while some color was lost, it didn't wear off completely (and wasn't patchy), so I didn't need to reapply unless I wanted to. So easy and long-lasting I decided to wear during the day, with no regrets. Only downside is a slightly odd smell (not terrible, not great) that eventually went away after 2-3 uses. Ultimately liked this so much, ended up buying in another color, and will buy more.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 October 2023

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: The cap falls off.. stains everything.
review: I like this so far. It is between a lipstick and lip balm. Ok.The cap will not stay on. There is no locking action.  Do not keep this in your purse!  Luckily, I figured it out before it went into my expensive bag.I am quite angry but not wasting another minute worrying about it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 December 2023

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Beautiful colour and nourishing!
review: Really beautiful colour and feels super soft on my lips - I found this after a suggestion from an instagram influencer. Will be buying again once mine is finished.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2023

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Moisturizing and comfortable! Cherry Wood Creme
review: One application eaves my dry lips feeling very soft for hours. Color is richly pigmented and surprisingly long wearing. Product description says Cherry Wood Creme is a reddish brown. It seems to me to be a rich pinkish purple, but my husband said it's reddish brown. The the only reason I gave it four stars is because I am not certain about shade, but I am wearing it.  I recommend it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 July 2023

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Lip Balm
review: This balm makes my lips feel protected from the cold wind. Also live the color. Plan on ordering more
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 January 2024

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Pretty color, not worth price.
review: I like the color. It's about as moisturizing as chapstick, but feels thinner on the lips. It lasts about as long as chapstick, too, but gives you good color while it's on. However, it's absolutely NOT worth the $12 I paid for it. I thought there would be more product in the tube. The photo I uploaded is all the product you get. I twisted it all the way out.  I'd gladly pay $6-$7 for it for the amount of product you get, but I definitely won't be buying again at $12.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 March 2023

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Perfect lip tint
review: I love this so much that i ordered another shade. Unfortunately they sent me the smaller/older version as they advertise 30% more! I had to contact customer service to get a partial refund! $12 for a lip tint, i want all of that 30% more product. Great product though, lasts for hours & moisturizes my lips well.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 June 2023

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Pretty and long lasting
review: Pretty and long lasting... moisturizing.

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon

review: This color is darker and bolder than I thought it would be— definitely NOT sheer coverage— more like bold lipstick. I like it but it fades/wears off very quickly.

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: NA
review: This can be quite drying only downside and a bit valet if you apply too much, but this stuff stays all day! I mean all day, eating, drinking, talking, kissing! Great longwear product!

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: NA
review: My daughter introduced me to this lippy. It lasts all night. Lips feel a bit dry, but the colour stays put. Very impressed.

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: NA
review: For the past 4-5 years I’ve been using the Maybeline Super Stay 24 colour 115.  This product is excellent as I usually eat my lipstick within 5 min of applying it.Then by chance I found a new wand of the Rimmel Provocalips 16 hour Make your move 730 in a drawer. I don’t know when I bought it or if my daughter gave it to me or how long it’s been there.  I tried it to see if I liked the colour and I did.  The next morning it was still on my lips even after washing my face the night before.  I was amazed.  The sad thing is, I think Rimmel has changed the formula of the Provocalips and I can’t find this particular one anywhere.  I bought the new formula one but it is not the same.  I managed to find the same old formula one at Amazon in a slightly different colour Summer Lovin,  and it is also great.  You can get the old formula from overseas but the postage cost is ridiculous 3 times more than you pay for the product.  So if anyone knows where I can get the original Provocalips in Australia I would love to know.  Thank you.

Otherwise, it looks moist without being glossy. The clear coating really goes quickly, so I barely use it on weekdays. This lasts me for a long time as once light coat does the job.

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: Un vrai coup de coeur !
review: Ce rouge à lèvres se présente  en 2 parties :* La couleur : La texture, onctueuse, et glisse agréablement sur les lèvres. Son application est homogène.* Le baume : De couleur transparente, ce baume fait office de double emploi. Il fixe et fait briller la couleur.Véritablement sans transfert de couleur ! Seul le baume se dépose sur les surfaces mises en contact avec les lèvres.J'ai pris la couleur "200 - I'll Call You". C'est un très joli rose, franc sans être pétant !Quant à la tenue, je l'enlève avant les 16h mais elle tient très très longtemps.Conquise !

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: Eccezionale, basta saperlo usare al meglio.
review: I rossetti liquidi in 2 step mi piacciono particolarmente perché uniscono in un solo prodotto le caratteristiche positive di una tinta labbra (a livello di durata) a quelle di un rossetto più idratante.In particolare questo è uno dei migliori che io abbia provato: resiste davvero per tantissime ore (sono arrivata a 11, poi ho dovuto struccarmi) e non teme cibi oleosi, per cui consente, una volta applicato, di vivere l'intera giornata/serata senza preoccupazioni, sbavature o ritocchi.Certo è che queste tinte vanno sapute utilizzare al meglio, per mia esperienza posso dirvi:- applicatele su labbra asciutte, precedentemente idratate e perfettamente pulite (al massimo utilizzate una base studiata appositamente per labbra)- fate una prima passata e lasciatela asciugare bene senza strofinare le labbra tra loro- fate un'eventuale seconda passata se volete un colore più intenso- una volta asciutta la base colore mettete un leggero strato del gloss idratante, sempre evitando di chiudere le labbra, sfregandole.Il gioco è fatto, lo strato di gloss proteggerà il rossetto dall'attacco di sostanze grasse, che tenderebbero a farlo sciogliere, motivo per cui durante la giornata potrete rinnovarlo al bisogno, ma nel mio caso, anche senza questo accorgimento, il colore è durato davvero un'infinità, iniziando solo minimamente ad affievolirsi a partire dal centro delle labbra.Struccare queste tinte in realtà non è difficile, a patto che utilizziate un prodotto bifasico o comunque a base oleosa (se non li avete vanno più che bene del comune olio di cocco, olio di oliva & co.).Last but not least... ottime performance a un ottimo prezzo!(Il prodotto arriva con sigillo trasparente adesivo su ambedue i lati del flacone. Della tinta son presenti 4 ml, mentre del gloss 3 ml; ha una durata di 12 mesi dall'apertura ed è "made in Germany".)

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour

review: This is the longest lasting red lipcolor that I have ever owned. Easy to apply, dries after about 1-2 minutes and stays on, and on, and on....i mean this stuff lasts FOREVER. I took a shower, washed my face even brushed my teeth and the lipstick was still on my lips! Once I forgot to take my makeup off, and in the morning the lipcolor looked like i'd freshly applied it! This stuff is basically like painting your lips and the color is also really really nice. A must have!

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: Un Rossetto Che Incanta: Rimmel London Little Minx!
review: Ho acquistato il rossetto Rimmel London nel colore Little Minx per mia moglie, e devo dire che è rimasta incantata da questo prodotto.Iniziamo con il colore: il Little Minx è un tono incredibilmente affascinante. Ha una sfumatura vibrante e audace che ha subito aggiunto un tocco di allure e fascino al look di mia moglie. Il colore è perfetto per creare un effetto wow e catturare l'attenzione.La texture del rossetto è morbida e cremosa, il che rende l'applicazione facile e confortevole. Mia moglie ha notato che il rossetto si stende in modo uniforme e non secca le labbra, mantenendole idratate e morbide.La durata del colore è stata una piacevole sorpresa. Anche dopo alcune ore di utilizzo, il Little Minx ha mantenuto il suo splendore e la sua intensità, evitando la necessità di ritocchi costanti.La confezione da 1 unità è pratica e adatta a portarla ovunque. Il rossetto è stato una scoperta preziosa nella borsa di mia moglie, pronto per essere applicato in qualsiasi momento.In conclusione, Rimmel London Little Minx è un rossetto che incanta e sorprende. Il colore vibrante, la texture morbida e la lunga durata lo rendono un accessorio di bellezza eccezionale. Mia moglie lo adora e non può fare a meno di indossarlo per creare un look audace e seducente. Lo consiglio vivamente a tutte le donne che desiderano aggiungere un tocco di glamour e fascino al loro look quotidiano!

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: Mooie kleur lippenstift
review: Een veilige kleur die je lippen net dat extra's geeft en niet overdreven aanwezig is. Staat bij alle kleding.

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: ABSOLUTELY BEST LIPSTICK 💄 EVER
review: I absolutely LOVE this product. Stays on for hours !

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: Color precioso y muy buena duración (Flirty Fling)
review: Hacía tiempo lo había probado (no estaba morena) y me quedaba hermoso, ahora estoy morena por el verano, he decidido comprarlo y también me sienta genial, creo que puede ir bien tanto para tonos fríos y cálidos de piel, es un nude rosita bastante universal. En esta línea de nudes, recomiendo también el tono 730 Make your move (tira más a "carne", más bien cálido y ligeramente más oscurito).De duración en mi caso igual que otros fijos que tengo como los Matte Ink o los Macarons de L'Oreal. Destaco en éstos que se queda una textura muy ligera y al final se me acaba yendo un poco por la mucosa al comer y con el paso de unas cuantas horas (pero esto me pasa con todos, no lo considero un defecto en sí del producto). Un retoquito y ya está, pero en este caso, al fundirse bastante con el color de mi labio, ni siquiera es que haga mucha falta (si fuera un color más fuerte, quizás sí).Entre la capa de color y el brillo/fijador hay que apenas esperar, se seca rápido. Al principio no se queda mate del todopero con el paso del tiempo sí (de todas formas, para mí no es ningún problema, tampoco es que quede super glossy ni nada por el estilo, apenas brillosito). Lo único negativo que le encuentro es que el brillo empieza a escasear cuando aún no se ha acabado el color (me ha pasado con otros, es que realmente trae menos producto y es más denso, por lo cual cunde menos). También es menor cantidad de producto que otros fijos en general. Pero por el precio al que aquí se consiguen y el resultado del producto, valen totalmente la pena. Un producto muy recomendable en general.
date: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 30 October 2023

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: HALLUCINANT
review: Époustouflant ! Tient du matin au soir sans retouche et sans transfert. Et ça part tout seul avec du démaquillant waterproof

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: Lipstick
review: A speedy delivery, all seals unbroken, happy that it was unused and brand new

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: リピーターです
review: 数年使ってます。本当に落ちにくく最高です。日本での販売は終了しているみたいで、やっと見つけて今回買いだめさせてもらいました。

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: Doppio uso, matte e lucido!
review: Il rossetto si presenta come un lucidalabbra, ma ha due parti.La parte colorata ha finish matte, ossia opaco, quindi è una tinta labbra no transfer a tutti gli effetti. Può essere usata da sola e già così ha un bellissimo effetto. Se vi piace, passate l'altro scovolino, che è il fissativo che dà un finish lucido.Il rossetto si asciuga molto presto, tanto che lo scovolino lucido, passato dopo, è rimasto pulito!Non si toglie facilmente (anche dopo essermi struccata mi sembrava ci fosse della pigmentazione sulle labbra), quindi è durevole.Ho messo varie foto per farvi vedere l'effetto dei vari colori e della loro durata.1) Flirty Fling con lucido2) Flirty Fling senza lucido, solo matte3) Flirty Fling, c'è ancora pigmentazione dopo una giornata in cui ho mangiato e bevuto normalmente.4) Kiss me you fool, versione matte5) Fire Creacker, versione matteDalla foto si vede l'effetto morbido, non avvertivo l'effetto "tirante" che molte volte danno le tinte labbra.Consiglio di aspettare che la parte colorata si sia asciugata prima di stendere il lucido, in questo modo lo scovolino bianco resta sempre completamente pulito.Personalmente preferisco la versione matte senza lucido, mi piacciono più le tinte opache sulle labbra, ma ovviamente è questione di gusti!Arriva sigillato e anche questo mi ha fatto piacere, i trucchi senza sigillo sono antigienici e li rimando immediatamente indietro.Consigliatissimo, uno dei migliori (se non il migliore) rossetto no transfer mai provati, anche i colori più sgargianti donano un bell'effetto, prezzo assolutamente competitivo e tenuta performante.

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour

review: It really lasts for a whole day (somethimes even longer).You can only remove it by oil based makeup removal.But it’s completly water proof.I’ve been using it for years.This color is very good too, true to the photo.

review: I always use this make my normal shade is discontinued so tried this shade and it’s just as good  very good price too

prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: DUREVOLE OTTIMO PRODOTTO
review: Ho aspettato un po’ prima di scrivere questa recensione per valutare al meglio questo splendido e utilissimo prodotto. La spedizione è stata davvero veloce con Amazon Prime e il prodotto è addirittura arrivato prima del previsto, come sempre Amazon è una garanzia. Il venditore è davvero affidabile e svolge in modo meticoloso il proprio lavoro. L'imballaggio è molto buono, di giusta grandezza, facile da aprire e curato in modo da nascondere il proprio contenuto. Tutti i materiali che compongono il prodotto in questione sono ben realizzati nei dettagli. Tutti i componenti del prodotto funzionano alla perfezione. Il design è gradevole. Sono davvero soddisfatto di questo acquisto che consiglio vivamente per il suo eccezionale rapporto qualità/prezzo. I colori del prodotto corrispondono a quelli in foto. Ottimo rimmel resistente e durevole per mote ore. Colore molto bello. Ero un po’ scettico in fase di acquisto visto che non vi era alcuna recensione dettagliata, ma chi mi segue sa che a me piace rischiare, quindi ho effettuato l’acquisto e devo dire che questa volta sono stato davvero fortunato perché il prodotto è davvero straordinario e molto utile per le mie esigenze quotidiane.📦 Imballaggio ottimo da nascondere il prodotto all'interno 📦💲 Ottimo Rapporto Qualità/Prezzo💲✅ Consiglio Vivamente L’acquisto Di Questo Valido Prodotto ✅🚧 GRAZIE PER L’ATTENZIONE CHE MI HAI DEDICATO!!! 🚧

review: I just love this lippy.  It lasts all day and works much better than my expensive Chanel lip stain.  You must must let it dry for a couple of minutes before you add the top coat.  I love Rimmel Provocalips.  I also mix two colours to get my perfect shade.

title: Not what it promised

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: It doesn't budge! But color description is way off
review: Milan is actually a true pink on me, not a brown-pink as advertised. It's definitely bright and not dark. I still like it, even though it's not a typical look for me. The best thing about this lip color is that I can eat an entire meal without it rubbing off. That's a rare lipstick! It does require a little extra effort to remove at the end of a day. Application feels nice; it's slick and glides on smoothly. It's instantly opaque with a shimmery metallic finish. This is for you if you want something fun.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 November 2023

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: If you're a Budapest fan...
review: Nyx's Budapest is my favorite shade of lipstick (Budapest original is shown in my selfie). I was excited to find the same shade with this metallic matte finish (love the modern yet natural look of matte! 😊). I applied it, let it dry, looked at it, it looked off and the color wasn't as flattering as usual. The metallic Budapest is a fairly different shade, when put side-by-side, than the original Budapest matte finish. The original Budapest is more of a mulberry color (like a rosey mauve color), the metallic Budapest is way more coppery orange, like a rosey pumpkin shade. I love Nyx lip products, they're flattering colors with great coverage, you can't feel that you're wearing their lip products, never sticky or hot, great quality products for a low price so it delivered in that sense. But I had to take away a star for the color not being like the original. I would understand putting a gold metallic in the shade so it would look "metallic" but it's too orange and throws off the whole color. If you didn't buy Budapest you'll probably be happy with your purchase though, still great lip color! 🤷‍♀️
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 May 2021

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: Cobertura y permanencia
review: Producto 100% recomendado
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 November 2023

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: Love it
review: I’m a girl who doesn’t wear a ton of makeup. I’m a minimalist but always want a slight tint to my lips. This red is actually perfect for what I do! I dab just a little of it on and then smooth it out with chapstick for the perfect amount of color. It lasts a while as well. I’m a sensitive ginger and a lot of products make my lips feel irritated but not this one :)
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 September 2021

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: A major lip product homerun!
review: I accidentally purchased 2 of these in Copenhagen but I'm really glad I did.  I put a light layer of it over the top of Maybelline 24 hour super stay in the color Always Heather and I LOVE it.  Its a reap wine color that seriously last through anything including eating and drinking!  It also is not sticky or wet at all so I can kiss my husband with zero transfer which is a huge bonus because he hates lip products getting on his lips.  I plan to purchase several of the NYX super soft matte metallic shades as the metallic ones are the ones that last their regular matte ones are still kinda wet when they dry down.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2019

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: Lovely shade, feels good, best used with a moisturizing chapstick to avoid clumping
review: Very happy with this shade. I get compliments on it all the time. Lasts a nice while if you also use it with a moisturizing stick or chapstick to keep from clumping. Otherwise, can feel a little dry or pasty.  I'm very happy with it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 July 2022

I also own a Milan shade lip liner, which is quite light - so I was definitely expecting this lip shade to be similar. I was shocked to see that instead, it is a very bright barbie-type shade of pink. Don't get me wrong, it's still a pretty color - just not at all what I was expecting.

prod_name: 3INA MAKEUP - The Lipstick 270 - Dark Red Matte Lipstick
title: Bonito, pero no
review: No es el color que esperaba. En la foto se ve un tono lila rosado y luego es totalmente violeta. Aún así es bonito. Creo que es muy favorecedor el pieles muy muy claras, y no es mi caso. El cierre tiene un tipo imán que lo mantiene bien cerrado, lo que es un plus. Es totalmente mate. El efecto es como atalcado. Al probarlo en la mano he notado que desaparece con rozar el dedo unas cuantas veces, lo que supone que durará poco si no se usa un producto fijador.Seguiré buscado el labial en tono lila rosado que necesito.

prod_name: 3INA MAKEUP - The Lipstick 270 - Dark Red Matte Lipstick
title: Worth the price
review: The lipstick is highly pigmented as the price would suggest, the smell is pleasant but at the same time very mild. It has decent staying power and won't transfer too much. The shade is ultra nice, I had a similar one from Maybelline a few years ago but it smelled industrial and came off very easily. The packaging is very neatly done, probably the nicest lipstick packaging I've seen. I had previously bought the shade 437 and I've been equally happy with that one as well. It's vegan, cruelty-free and made in Italy (EU rules) so this brand is definitely my new favorite!

prod_name: OULAC Pink Metallic Shine Lipstick, Baby Pink Glitter Long Lasting
title: Beauté de la couleur métallisée et confort à l'application
review: Rouge à lèvres metallisé "12 Cherry Bombe" très belle couleur fidèle à la photo 👌Très confortable à l'application, il ne dessèche pas les lèvres et a plutôt une bonne tenue. Cependant, comme ce n'est pas un rouge longue tenue, il faut bien sûr faire des retouches après avoir mangé. Deplus, l'étui d'aspect doré est très élégant, on dirait un article de luxe !😍Je ne regrette pas mon achat, c'est un excellent rapport qualité-prix et je pense que je le rachèterai !Il me fait penser aux RAL "WaterShine Diamonds" de Gemey Maybelline, il y a 20 ans qui donnaient également un bel effet métallisé : visuellement ça augmente évidemment le volume des lèvres. En revanche, contrairement aux "WaterShine" il n'a pas d'aspect "Glossy"

prod_name: OULAC Pink Metallic Shine Lipstick, Baby Pink Glitter Long Lasting
title: Optisch toll, aber......
review: Optisch ist der Stift großartig: Die Hülle ist wunderschön und beim Zumachen magnetisch! Aber die Farbe "(11) Hip & Hippie"  ist leider viel dunkler als abgebildet und passt mir nicht. Abgesehen davon hat mich der Stift leider auch nicht überzeugt. Er hinterlässt ein leicht klebriges Gefühl auf meinen Lippen und trotzdem trocknet er sie etwas aus. Er hält auch nicht so lange wie erwartet. Die Inhaltstoffe sind aber im Großen und Ganzen recht gut. Von da her kann man den Stift empfehlen. Ich allerdings werde ihn aufgrund der Farbe wohl selten bis gar nicht verwenden. Schade.

Tiene un sutil brillo dorado,  es súper bonito. Y en verano creo que va a ser top. Se lo recomiendo a todas las rubias que estén morenas y no usan labiales fuertes. Calidad precio top.

prod_name: OULAC Pink Metallic Shine Lipstick, Baby Pink Glitter Long Lasting
title: Pas aussi brillant que sur la photo
review: Rose nacré , lèvres paillettes,  formule crémeuse hydratante  .  Voilà la description du rouge à lèvre que j'ai acheté .Je suis un peu déçue.  Le rendu du rose sur les lèvres n'est pas le même que sur la photo,  loin de là . Il ne paillette pas et le rose est très doux loin du rose brillantmontré.La texture n'est pas non plus crémeuse hydratante.  Elle est plutôt sèche.  Il faut d'abord hydrater ses lèvres,  mettre une couche de rouge à lèvres,  mettre un mouchoir en papier  entre ses lèvres comme pour enlever le trop plein et remettre une couche de ce rouge voir 2 .Je reste néanmoins sur un bien car ce rose est tout de même joli même sans le brillant et il tient avec cette technique d'application.

title: It stays on and on…
review: I use this first and let it set. Then I top it with a gloss. It would stay on longer if I didn’t apply gloss on top. I love my lips to always feel moisturized. This is a really good product; it stays on for hours even though I top it with a good moisturizing gloss. Perfect combo for lips that keep the color and do not feel dry.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 February 2024

prod_name: Rimmel Stay Matte Lip Liquid, Pink Blink, 0.21 Fluid Ounce
title: It’s OK
review: It’s a nice colour Pink Blink and it doesn’t change to dark pink like some. It’s very matte a bit drying and the brush brings too much out at one time, I have some gloss and I put a little of that on top. But I’d get it again.

prod_name: Rimmel Stay Matte Lip Liquid, Pink Blink, 0.21 Fluid Ounce
title: Rose something is the one I wear most.
review: It is a little sticky at first and takes a couple minutes to dry completely but I really like this color and the price can’t be beat. I’ve also bought a couple other shades, one called Midnight and I like that color a lot. It’s more of a nighttime color for me, but I will definitely be buying them both again. I haven’t tried the other one yet so can’t speak on it yet.It can get a bit clumpy especially obvious on the darker color so use a light coating and build from there if needed.As with most matte liquids on is with very fair skin, if you get it on your skin it can stain pretty fast so be very careful. Use a liner to help avoid this if you want. It helps but isn’t mandatory. I’ve done both and both are they both work fine with this formula.Definitely recommend for the price and the pretty colors and good coverage.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 April 2023

prod_name: Rimmel Stay Matte Lip Liquid, Pink Blink, 0.21 Fluid Ounce
title: Lipstick is worth the $$$ product not safety sealed
review: I’ve bought a two shades now from this seller; currently trying the Vanilla Lovin’ shade. The shade itself was exactly what I was going for but the formula is kind of splotchy so with this colour and most of the nudes you have to apply 2-3 coats for it to look even and matte. But once on it stays on even when eating and drinking for at least four hours with minimal budge and reapplication. One thing that bothers me is that these tubes don’t come sealed with stickers so literally they could be returns or could have been opened and tested but you would ever know Because there’s no security seal anywhere which is disconcerting for a beauty product. Now that I know this is normal for this shop I’ll buy this line from my local drug store, where at least the tubes are safe sealed (particularly during a pandemic).

prod_name: Rimmel Stay Matte Lip Liquid, Pink Blink, 0.21 Fluid Ounce
title: I love it but
review: Easy, smooth application. Fast drying. The color is deep and gorgeous - but it doesn’t dry plum, it dries red. I’m seeing very little purple hue - maybe it’s best described as burgundy instead of plum. Sad because that’s not one of my best colors. Was really looking forward to purple. I’ll use this brand again but not when seeking a specific color.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 October 2023

prod_name: Rimmel Stay Matte Lip Liquid, Pink Blink, 0.21 Fluid Ounce
title: Long lasting!
review: First time ever buying/using Rimmel. This acts more like a lip stain. Perfect for me as I don’t like lipsticks that transfer easily and need to be touched up often or end up with some on front teeth. Goes on wet but dries almost immediately so caution to get right amount where needed. I use “chapstick” to get a bit of a gloss finish to change the appearance a bit. Most of the time I just apply a small amount and gently go over lips for a more subtle look. Lasts quite a long time which is ideal for me. Anxious to try other colours as this can be put on super light for less vibrant colour or heavier for darker shade. Makes it a fairly handy way to save room in purse, makeup case. I bought a few different colours to use as I really like this. Also, not heavy with perfume/scent.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 April 2023

prod_name: Rimmel Stay Matte Lip Liquid, Pink Blink, 0.21 Fluid Ounce
title: About the Product
review: I ordered the fire starter. The color is very vibrant but the color doesn't match my skin and that was my own mistake.When you apply the matte lipstick, a little goes a long way. I suggest you pat a little on your lips and then spread it. Then add a little more to the areas you missed because the color is so vibrant and smooth, that it is like putting on chapstick.The moisture of the matte lipstick is unbelievable! It doesn't dry out your lips or cake up. It's feels as if you aren't wearing any lipstick because of how light it is.The longevity lasts you a very long time.My only concern was how the item didn't come with an enclosed wrap.Besides that this is worth your money!Just be careful of the color you choose.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 August 2022

This classic shade works on just about everyone.The gloss has color in it that stays well for the life of the product. The product has a very good dry down. And it's obviously not transfer proof, but it's definitely not sticky or tacky at all.I obviously highly recommend the product and shade. I don't even wear makeup on a daily basis and never go through a product before it's become old and crusty. And yet this is a product I've gotten to the bottom of twice! I'd call that a win for sure. I was so impressed that I got to the bottom of the product I just had to buy more. 😍

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: BEST LIP GLOSS EVER!!
review: This is truly the best lip gloss I have ever used. It took me six months to complete my first bottle, which blew me away that it lasted so long. The formula is so thick and moisturizing but not sticky at all. I don’t know how they do it but I hope the formula never changes. I do think the colored formulas are kind of streaky but this clear one is the best clear lip gloss on the market. Even better than Fenty —which hurts me to say. truly worth the money. And it smells yummy. Like old school cotton candy jellies.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 February 2019

review: Has a cute amount of pigment. Lightweight and feels good on your lips. A bit of a cherry medicinal scent, but you get used to it. I would get this again.

date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 September 2023

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Glossy, non-sticky, smells like cherry!
review: This is the perfect clear lip gloss (I got the clear Extra Poppin shade). Smells exactly like the traditional cherry scent (like cherry Twizzler smell/cherry cough drop)...The applicator is a doe-foot shape, very comfy and applies very smoothly. The formula itself is moisturizing, not sticky, very shiny and glossy. This is great for wearing over your favorite lipstick/lip stain shade and giving it that extra shine. Definitely will be buying some of these in other colors.One thing - it does seem to come off after eating. I expect this with most lip glosses though. That being said, it is moisturizing enough that my lips don't feel completely stripped of moisture afterwards.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 August 2019

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: LOVE!
review: I love this lip gloss :) I have the Wet Cherry and it smells so good!!! It’s soft, non sticky, and gives my lips shine. I definitely recommend this product. I have been trying to find a really good lip gloss but they are always too sticky and too thick. The Wet Cherry is the perfect consistency.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 August 2021

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Cherry Lipgloss
review: it is STRONG cherry flavored. if you dont mind the smell and taste then this is the perfect gloss.. not sticky and lasts for a while.. the color is a beautiful sheer nude! i love it!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 July 2023

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: This did NOT have a security seal.
review: I bought the Coach heart ❤️ shaped cherry purse for my granddaughters 16th birthday 🎂.  I purchased this 💋 💄 👄 lip gloss and many other cherry and heart shaped accessories to put inside this bag. It's just as described.  I wish the packaging had a safty seal around it so that I know as a customer it's Brand new. It does come in a box, but no security seal. That was disappointing. The color looks perfect.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 September 2023

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: but pricey
review: Clean, simple gloss, nostalgic cherry scent, shiny but not sticky, cute Lime Crime packaging. My only complaint is that the applicator is so big and wide it takes up most of the space inside the container thus limiting the amount of actual gloss and at $18 that's quite disappointing. With reapplications I don't see this product lasting more than a few months.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 November 2018

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Amazing
review: I love this gloss so much that I bought more. It smells like a literal maraschino cherry and it isn’t sticky. It’s thick, but in a good way unlike a lot of glosses which either feel clumpy or too thin. It lasts long and my lips feel moisturized and nourished for hours. The tube was filled all the way and you only have to apply it every few hours (I reapply most glosses every 10 minutes or so). It’s amazing. smell reminds me of lip smackers but it’s much better quality.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 August 2023

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Forget the beauty supply glosses, get this NOW!
review: Ladies and gents, let me tell y’all something today! This gloss is fabulous, long lasting, and lightweight.. If you’re darker skinned like me, this lipgloss (obviously) will appear clear, but still GORGEOUS. I’m not a fan of the cherry medicine smell and there’s not really a flavor, but I’m living for the shine and longevity. It even lasted through the sushi and mochi I had for lunch!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 May 2019

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Maybe Not OverPriced
review: At First I Thought It Was Over Priced But It Took About A Week To Realize How I Like To Use It. Here's why It May Not Be Over Priced. If Your A Lip Gloss Wearer You Will Know The Formula Is A Selling Point OMG. It's Not A Pillowy Gloss So I Always Put A High Gloss On Top But This Is Hands Down One Of The Best Lip Glosses In My Vast Collection, Because Of The Longevity Wear And Moisturizing Formula After It Wears Off. And I Love The Cherry Scent, It's Very Noticable.  If Yu Can Pay 12.00 For Victoria Secret Lip Gloss Which Are A Very Low Quality Formula In My Opinion You Can Pay For This.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 February 2020

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Meh
review: CONS:not pigmented AT ALLruns out quicker than most glossespackaging is sometimes hard to openoverpricedunflavoredPROS:amazing scent (heavily fragrant)cute packagingthe doe foot applicator is plush and lovely
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 August 2023

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Stinky but cute
review: My immediate impression was how adorable the packaging was, just like most other lime crime products. The packaging is pink and red with shiny cherries on it. I took the tube out of the package, which was also gorgeous, and opened it up to swatch it. This is where things took a turn for the worse -- the gloss wasn't nearly as shiny as I'd expected it to be. The smell also kicked in, and that's when I felt the first inkling of disappointment. It smells like a cross between cherry soda and a port-a-potty! Although the smell could be interpreted in many ways, it will take some getting used to for me. I'm still going to wear the gloss because I love the packaging and the texture (not sticky at all!), but you might want to consider purchasing a different product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 August 2018

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Worth the purchase IMO, Pros v. Cons in the Description
review: I ordered the "Juicy Cherry", it's a light sparkly pink. It arrived quickly without damages (which is rare for amazon). On to the list-Pros: It's cruelty free and much more affordable than what I'd usually buy from sephora for an equally good product. It's cute and it smells good (like an artificial candy like cherry smell). It has a thick consistency with just a slight tackiness; it's not too sticky. Once it sets/dries, it's consistency improves. It's got shimmer with slight sparkle. The pink is like a warm baby pink, really enhances the color of your lips. Slim and cute packaging.Cons:It does transfer and it's staying power is moderate unless you eat or drink, like most lip products unfortunately.I have never been a fan of lip gloss because I'm sensitive to textures and consistencies. I decided to try something new and I'm glad I did. I really enjoy this product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 July 2023

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Blast from the past!
review: I have been searching for a classic clear gloss like what I used in the 90s and early 00s...I found it!! Big tube, big doefoot applicator, hint of cherry scent and flavor...love it!! And the best part? The stickiness of the 90s is gone, and this gloss gives a high shine finish with a weightless feel-I can actually wear it over lipstick!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 January 2019

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Great stuff
review: The bestI own 3 and will buy the other colors

review: I personally didn’t like the smell. Ir smelled like cherry but more chemical and like children’s medicine. I couldn’t stand it, but the color was very pretty and made my lips feel and look nice. My sister and a few of my friends loved the smell, so I ended up gifting it to my sister.

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)

title: No

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Got the wrong shade
review: So I ordered Extra Poppin because I wanted a clear gloss with a pop of color and got Juicy Cherry instead. Which honestly isn't the end of the world, it's pretty sheer and the glitter isn't egregious or scratchy like some glitter glosses can be.It's fairly thick, which I don't love but it isn't too sticky. It also kind of tastes like kids makeup mixed with cough syrup, but once again it isn't too flavorful so that doesn't matter.I don't really feel like it's worth 18$, it kind of feels like kids makeup. Which is a shame because I love Lime Crime lipsticks.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 February 2023

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Cute, but not pigmented
review: The scent and small of this product reminds me of my old school 90's lipgloss. It brings back memories. The product feels great on the lips and is very glossy. However, I feel that the product pictures are edited to look more pigmented than it is. I'm a very pale girl, so I wasn't expecting much color. But I was expecting to see some sort of tint. It really just looks like a clear gloss with my skin tone. I'm not mad at it. I just wouldn't call this a "nude" lip color
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 August 2020

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Not as much pigment as pictured
review: I ordered this in Diet Cherry. It’s a fun reddish/wine color, but not nearly as pigmented as pictured (it’s quite sheer) but lip liner can help with that. Nice, creamy consistency and feels comfortable on my lips. Not sure about how long lasting this is, but it does look nice and is very glossy. Great for dry lips.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 November 2022

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Worth the money!!!
review:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    
This lip gloss is so glossy and so rich it’s worth the money!! It don’t have flavor but the gloss makes up for that I’m really not sure if it last long but I do know I’ll be ordering more!!!

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Great texture and packaging, subpar taste
review: The gloss is thick but not too sticky.The packaging is super cute and heavy duty.The applicator is large and picks up a lot of product.My only gripe is the taste and smell.It tastes like a dollar store chapstick.It’s not bad, but for the price I’d expect it to smell and taste like rainbows.I think I’ll just stick to Essence’s clear gloss, which has a much better taste and costs 6 times less.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 August 2020

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Very thin
review: You cannot get the achieved look like the sample pics unless you really slather on many layers. Good luck drinking or eating anything. It's actually very thin.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 October 2023

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Slippery wet delicious and NOT sticky.
review: This is the very first time i bought this gloss. Never bought anything from Lime Crime before and I based my purchase only because of the massive popularity and positive feedback. I gotta say, it gave me a 90s nostalgia when I used to wear the cherry gloss rollers I used to buy at places like Claire's. (OMG). This gloss is incredibly delicious. From its flavor to its texture. It has a big wide wand, the formula is impeccably clear, flavor feels natural, the formula is not sticky... (Do you have any idea how RARE is that?!?!). Bottomline, I am TOTALLY purchasing this again!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 September 2020

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Smells Odd..?
review: I like the color but the scent of the product really threw me off. It's somewhat vanilla mixed with bubblegum but in a sickly way, overpowering. Something about it is off for me so I can't use it. It's a thick tinted gloss and seems to have a good amount of product. I have velvetine feelins as well and the gloss smells much more intense if anyone was wondering for comparison. I'm unsure if this is the usual thing for this particular product. I would buy other colors if they had a different scent.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 January 2022

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: great product
review: i got the cherry slime color and it got here fine, no damage or anything. it looks great over black lipstick but i can't get a good photo to save my life. the one thing is it has an uncanny gogurt smell which i'm totally fine with but if you don't like that then this isn't the gloss for you
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 January 2022

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Obsessed
review: Hello lovelies!!!  i am SO obsessed with these that I am slowly collecting them all. My favorites are the ones I have (lolz) which are the clear, the naked cherry, and the juicy cherry. I LOVE the effect on the lips, so luscious and juicy. The texture is like a gel that is soft and cushy.  I find it has great adherence and color payoff. The only somewhat negative for me is the flavor a bit like cough syrup (cherry flavor is a fine line) but it doesn't prevent me from reaching for this product above even my YSL and Chanel beloved lip products. The price is on point, not too expensive but enough to support an American-made product and company and cute packaging.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 April 2019

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: My favorite
review: I wasn’t expecting it to be so great! Works better than chapstick for me.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 February 2023

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Pretty good! Wish there was more.
review: Lasts hours if you dont eat or kiss or smoke or talk 😅 so, so, so glossy! In the picture I have it on top of Lime Crimes Bloodmoon. Applied with a brush so I dont get color mixed into product.On the downside, the applicator is HUGE and takes up so much space. Once you remove it, what once looked liked it was full of product goes down to half empty (or half full depending on how you look at it!) And that's frustrating considering you just paid nearly $20 for gloss.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 August 2018

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Very pigmented and moisturizing
review: This is the exact lip colour Meghan markle wears on her wedding and other occasions. This is the sheer version because they discontinued the even darker version. This lipstick is very very pigmented though! It’s weird when people say it’s not. Moisturizing and nice packaging. Beautiful colour. I’ll buy all the shades. So scent to it either which I love.

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Love these!
review: I love everything about these crayons! Goes on so smooth, the color is so pretty and there's no scent. The only thing I'm not happy with is the cap doesn't snap on. It just slides on and doesn't stay on very well. I wish there were more colors.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 November 2023

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Mejor marca para mi
review: Me irritan y lastiman los labiales en general que venden de cualquier clase(aunque son de las marcas de lujo). Hasta Burts bees(creo que por la esencia de menta que contiene)y Almay(hypo alergénico) me lastimaron…ya no sabia que marca comprar. Pero esta marca parece que no contiene ingredientes que me lastiman y tengo ya unas semanas usándolo y todo bien. Aparte el color bonito. Espero que vendan en médico más variedad de colores.

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Love it!
review: I bought the color chestnut after watching an Instagram video of Jessica alba wearing the same color, and I love it!! It’s a very pretty color with a good amount of pigment. It softness my lips, has no smell and makes the little wrinkles on my lip smooth. I love it!! I will buy coral and other colors to add to my collection. Plus it’s great that there’s no harsh chemicals that you put on your lips or that you potentially eat it!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 January 2019

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Lovely colors
review: I liked the shade and idea of the product, but it turned out to be too messy and broke down quite quickly.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 October 2023

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Nice color, very dry
review: I use several of the Honesty products and have been pleased with them. I do not care for this lip crayon and will not order another. I was expecting it to be moisturizing, more on the order of a lip gloss, but it applies very dry. As a lip stain, the color lasts but I have to use another product for moisturizing and glossing. It is not "sheer" and there is no "subtle shine."
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 January 2020

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Moisturizing Lip Color
review: I really like this lip color.  It goes on smoothly and feels great on my lips.  Lasts a long time as well.

title: Love it
review: Not a big lipstick fan to begin with. Ran across this Honest brand & I am now a fan. This is affordable, it's clean & does what it claims. Size is perfect ..like a thin crayon in your purse. The color works for me.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 February 2022

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: No, it's not working
review: I purchased two colors they came a different time.  One was broken on arrived but you cannot return it.  I tied using it at least to see it's texture but it didn't work well, and the color is very faint.  The second one just arrived (not broken this time.)  The color was supposed to be vivid (#4 rose) but on my pail Scandinavian skin it doesn't look like anything but a faint tint ... less than an average gloss.  Also it doesn't stay on pass few minutes after the application .  not good.  Double disappointment
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 October 2023

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Love this lip color Rose
review: My second order and usually I buy a couple because the cosmetic companies keep changing the lip colors and sometimes it's no longer available my favorite color.  Light weight and stays pretty good and no smell.I hope they keep selling this color Rose.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 January 2023

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Definitely Sheer and Shiny.
review: First, I'd like to point out that these are supposed to be sheer (hence... the product name). I'm seeing some low ratings that the colors are too subtle. If your are expecting an opaque color, these are definitely not for you and you should spend your money on different lipsticks. These are kinda like Chapsticks with a tiny bit of color. Also, everyone will look different depending on your natural lip color. I have dark lips so most colors won't pop on mine but will probably show more on pale lips.Second, some other low ratings are because the colors didn't last at all. These aren't supposed to last. They're just lip balms pretty much. Though I have to admit that I wished the moisturizing effects lasted longer.With this said, these lip crayons are suppose to slightly enhance your natural lip color while giving a shine. Also smells good!There are hardly any swatch pictures online and on the website so I'm posting my own for your reference. I also took pictures (with flash) of the lip crayons on my bottom lip and naked top lips for comparison.My lips are slightly dark and naturally mauve with some deep pink undertones. So when I wear these...- Sherbert gives be a pink tint. (Without flash, the pink is noticeable)- Petal gives me a coral tint.- Chestnut is totally colorless and useless on my lips so I might return this. (I've seen a picture on someone else's pale lips and it really gives her a pretty nude brown/chestnut color).- Rose is a beautiful deep red color. (The flash accentuated the rose/pink but it's more like a deep red rose color.)My lips are dry and these don't accentuate my dry lips too bad. I'm also allergic to some ingredients (I don't know which ones irritate me) and these haven't flared or gave me blisters on my lips yet.If you're looking for a moisturizing lip product, with a sheer tint, you might want to try these. They're affordable and ingredients are less "toxic" (no parabens, no petrolatum, etc).These are definitely perfect for someone with pale lips. For those with darker lips, you will need to be more thoughtful about your color choices because the lighter colors will probably won't show very much.Too bad they don't last a long time but it's worth trying.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 April 2019

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Great product, packing issue
review: I've purchased this twice. The first time the lip crayon was exactly as described. Just the right amount of color, moisturizing, comfortable and light to wear. Not super long wearing, but not terrible either. My 3 year old got a hold of it and it wasn't salvageable, so I ordered the replacement. What was delivered came in a box marked Sheer Rose, exactly what I ordered. Inside the box, however, was Coral. Not at all flattering on my skintone and not worth the cost of return shipping for a refund. I was planning on wearing it to an event this weekend, but I'll have to make due with something else. I still loved my original Rose lip crayon and will probably reorder at a later date.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 May 2019

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Fruity smell
review: This product has a somewhat strong, fruity scent. If you’re sensitive to fragrances you might want to avoid this product and others from the same brand, which I found to have the same problem. It’s too bad because this company tries to have more health-aware ingredients than most.

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Perfect for my everyday look
review: I have a dark South Indian skin tone, so it is often hard to find compatible lip colors, but the Bordeaux is flattering and natural looking.This is perfect for everyday use; it looks natural, goes on easily, is enhancing, and doesn't dry out my lips. It is like a balm, so doesn't last too long. My only complaint is that it goes everywhere that your lips might touch (drinking a cup of tea pretty much removes an entire application).

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Nice color, applies smoothly, feels healthy
review: I just started using the Bordeaux lip crayon 4 days ago, and am pleasantly surprised.  It applies smoothly, the color is rich but not too intense and not dated, it moisturizes my lips, and best of all, it feels healthy and non-chemical.  For best color, I'd probably need to reapply it every couple hours, and maybe it would last longer if I wore lip primer (the color bleeds a little), but I'm satisfied with it the way it is.  Recommend!

The color is less sheer, it is less "glossy" or moisturizing and the color is a bit more peachy.Some people will like this - there's nothing necessarily wrong with it.  It just isn't what I thought I was going to get.I'm not sure if they changed the ingredients or what happened, but I'm disappointed.

The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    
‘Back row smooch’ has been my staple lipgloss since high school. I never tried the others. I guess if it ain’t broke don’t fix it. It’s literally the most natural tinted lipgloss it matches my natural lip color too (just a hotter pink) and goes with everything. title: Ultra-Hydrating Hybrid Gloss Plumper
review: I am beyond thrilled to have finally found this lip gloss after searching for it tirelessly. I used to purchase this product years ago in stores, but it seemingly disappeared from the shelves. However, thanks to my decision to check on Amazon, I stumbled upon it again, and it has quickly reclaimed its position as my favorite lip plumping gloss.One of the standout features of this gloss is its ultra-hydrating formula. It effortlessly glides onto my lips, providing a boost of moisture that leaves them feeling soft, supple, and nourished. Unlike other glosses that can leave my lips feeling dry and chapped, this product helps my lips appear smoother and more luscious.I especially appreciate the lip plumping effect that this gloss offers. While the tingling sensation may be off-putting for some, I personally find it invigorating and worth the slight tingle. The plumping effect isn't overwhelming or uncomfortable; instead, it provides a subtle enhancement to my lips, making them appear fuller and more defined.Another aspect that makes this lip gloss even more appealing is its vegan formulation. As someone who values ethical and cruelty-free products, I am delighted to know that this gloss aligns with my values. Its vegan ingredients offer peace of mind, allowing me to enjoy the product without compromising my principles.In terms of performance, this gloss ticks all the boxes. It delivers on its promises of hydration, smoothness, and plumping, leaving my lips looking and feeling fabulous. It also boasts impressive staying power, maintaining its shine and color throughout the day, reducing the need for constant reapplication.In conclusion, this Ultra-Hydrating Hybrid Gloss Plumper has made a triumphant return into my beauty routine, and I couldn't be happier. Its ability to provide both hydration and plumping effects sets it apart from other lip glosses I've tried in the past. The tingling sensation is surprisingly enjoyable, and its vegan formulation aligns with my values. If you're seeking a lip gloss that nourishes, enhances, and leaves your lips looking luscious, this is the perfect product for you. Don't hesitate to give it a try and experience its magic for yourself.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 July 2023

prod_name: Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Diamond Lip Plumper Gloss
title: New go to... 🤍🤍🤍
review: I don't see a massive plumping effect but it is there, enough so that this is my new favorite lip PRODUCT overall. It seems to soak into my lips overtime and actually hydrate them, rather than sit on top and have no benefit besides looks. This means you obviously have to reapply it but you do with any gloss. It has a pleasant smell, I would say just a cosmetics smell. Leaves no gross taste in your mouth. I would say that to me, it almost feels more cooling than tinglingly. So if you're looking for a plumper that burns, this isn't it. But I recently had an allergic reaction to the too face lip injection plumper, I think it's called, so I found this and prefer it so much more. The too faced product left a dark red line of inflammation/irritation around the outside of my lips even after removing the product. I almost gave up on plumpers all together because of that but I'm so glad I decided to try this. I want other colors now. 10/10 would recommend as a gloss hybrid balm that's very comfortable & flattering. 5/10 recommend if you're looking for significant plumping.

prod_name: Kosas Wet Lip Oil Gloss | Juicy, Plumping Treatment
title: My experience for using it for a day & 1/2
review: Got Unbuttoned because the color looks gorgeous when Glamzilla used it. When I first used it I loved it. Just 1 swipe with small amounts, my lips are already glossy & hydrated. If more than that my lips will look too oily.I was satisfied with color at first, but when I really started using it today, I got mixed feelings. One, it fits the description of being glossy & sheer. Two, just an hour or 2 without messing with it, the color became less noticeable & started to become my lip color. I'm not sure if it's because of the lighting or the lip oil got accustomed to my body temperature or something, my lip color looks like a slightly nicer pale pink; my original lip color is pale ash grey nude-pink. I don't really hate it, but when I started to add a bit more, the tint isn't as noticeable. The tint is a bit too sheer for my taste.However, I'm still going to use it because 1) it's pricey, 2) it works since my lips don't look dry or feel super dry (the dry winter weather is killing my lips). Lastly, I think that it works pretty well as a lip gloss or as a base for your lip stick. After putting on the lip oil, I dab a small amount of matte lip product using my finger, & it looks amazing. So far 30 or so minutes in, my lips aren't feeling dry at all!Overall, it's still a very good lip oil, but the color you see on the models is slightly incorrect, since the tint is about 1 or 2 shades lighter. Or it looks like that because they wore concealer before putting on the lip oil, I'm not sure.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 February 2023

prod_name: Kosas Wet Lip Oil Gloss | Juicy, Plumping Treatment
title: Not worth the price, misleading about plumping
review: I am pretty sure the only way that this product claims to plump lips once you really read the box is through peptides and hydration which is nourishment, but don't think you're getting anything near Too Faced Lip Injection or their copy cats. I ordered this shade, unbuttoned, and Dip, and I found both to be too brown and underwhelming on me. I have pale olive skin for reference, and I was personally hoping the pink undertones would come through more. I am thinking about trying Malibu, which looks too pink for me in the photo, but based on how much more muted these were in person it might work.Beside the color and lack of plumping, its not a bad lipgloss, but for the price its not worth it. I am a fan of other Kosas products, and if you are in to their mission statement then go ahead, but this isn't their holy grail item. It reminds me of Mary Kay lipglosses from the 2000s in texture and the high shimmer and gloss. I think this product could be compared to Dior Lip oil, in the sense that they are both decent products, and both marketed to a certain audience (guilty of both!) and sell it overpriced costs.TLDR; if it makes you happy, buy it. But, if you are looking for a unique and innovating lip product, this didn't do it for me.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 April 2023

title: Perfekt
review: Da ich bisher immer den Maybellin Superstay verwendet habe und dieser Lippenstift die gleiche Aufmachung hat wollte ich das testen.Ich muss sagen ich bin begeistert, essen 8auch fettiges/Öliges) trinken und küssen übersteht der Lippenstift perfekt.Angenehm auf den Lippen dank enthaltener Pflege. Auch der Auftrag ist einfach zu meistern. Wichtig erst die Farbe komplett trocknen lassen und dann erst die Pflege auftragen, dann hält der Lippenstift eine ganze Partynacht ohne Probleme aus.

review: It works for me.

prod_name: L'OREAL PARIS Infallible 2Step Lipstick, Relentless Rouge
title: Bin absolut begeistert
review: Das ist nach sehr vielen Experimenten für mich der perfekte "your lips but better" Lippenstift. Ein sehr dezenter und natürlicher Farbton der aber trotzdem nicht langweilig ist, ich empfinde ihn eher als elegant und ich habe bisher noch nie Komplimente bekommen wenn ich Lippenstift getragen habe, bei diesem hier jedoch schon mehrmals. Man muss allerdings sagen dass ich einen sehr hellen Hautton habe. Meine Mutter, schon über 60 und mit nur minimal dunklerem Ton als ich, sah mit diesem Ton eher "ausgewaschen" und fahl aus. Ich würde also auf jeden Fall empfehlen, nach Fotos der Farbe online zu suchen. Es gibt auch ein Video zu den Lippenstiftfarben von  L'Oréal auf Youtube.Die Haltbarkeit ist sehr gut, wenn leider auch nicht so lange wie bei den dunkleren, kräftiger pigmentierten Farben. Das ist andererseits nicht so tragisch weil es anders als bei den anderen Farben auch nicht 100% offensichtlich ist wenn die Farbe nicht mehr perfekt sitzt was auch sehr praktisch ist.Ich empfinde den Stift nicht als übermäßig austrocknend. er ist sicher weniger pflegend als normale Lippenstift aber bei weitem besser als lang haltende Stifte der älteren Generation. Den Pflegebalsam verwende ich meistens gar nicht weil damit die Haltbarkeit wie es mir scheint reduziert wird.Ich mag auch die Maybelline Superstay Lippenstife sehr gerne, die fühlen sich von der Konsistenz her etwas leichter an auf den Lippen als die L'Oréal Indefectible Stifte. Ich habe auch die beiden hellen Farben (Quartz Start und Delicious Pink) von Maybelline aber das sind einfach nur helle, ein bisschen langweilige Farben - bei weitem nicht so perfekt wie diese hier.Ich hoffe,  L'Oréal stellt diese Farbe niemals ein denn das ist der allererste Lippenstift den ich mir immer und immer wieder kaufen werde.

prod_name: L'OREAL PARIS Infallible 2Step Lipstick, Relentless Rouge
title: NO SE AGRIETA- DURADERO
review: Es de textura mate pero no se cuartea ni agrieta como otros, si lo aplicas bien. Da un tono aterciopelado.Tiene una barra de brillo, que si lo aplicas sobre este, cuando se ha secado, le da un tono hidratante. Esto es por si no te gusta el tono mate, puedes usarlo mate o brillo.Es un color natural apto para el día a día.✅ El color es muy bonito, es un tono precioso.✅ No se cuartea ni se agrieta✅ Dura horas y horas, puedes comer, beber, nadar, lo que quieras, que no se borra.✅ Queda hidratado✅ tono brillante✅ tono mateMUY IMPORTANTE APLICACIÓN:No aplicar en exceso, mojas el pincel pero que quede lo justo, y lo aplicas por el labio. Yo me aplico la parte de abajo y junto los labios y se pinta todo, y si queda algo sin perfilar, le das un toque. Pero es muy importante no poner en exceso, porque sino sí que se agrieta. Si te aplicas poco, queda una capa fina y adecuada. Tarda unos segundos en secarse, así que ten cuidado de no mancharte ahí.COMO QUITARLO:Si quieres quitarlo hay que quitarlo con una toallita desmaquillante y un desmaquillador en crema. Yo he probado con agua , con agua micelar, y tónico de limpieza , agua y jabón, y no se limpia. Solo con desmaquillante en crema.No deja rojeces ni irrita los labios, al menos en mi caso, que si me ocurre con otros pintalabios baratos.
